  • Business Intelligence tolls
  • Smart applications
  • Data Visualization
  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Big Data Analytics
  • IoT

  • Highly interoperable thanks to the ability to manage about 180 different formats and protocols
  • Business logic and microservices-based IOT applications with low coding/no coding
  • Powerful semantic engine for developing applications on multiple and heterogeneous domains and data sources
  • Extended IOT/IOE applications through integration of external services, data analytic, micro services, micro applications
  • Fully compliant with GDPR and security and privacy standards
  • Modular, scalable, robust, secure solutions
payoff: Digital Twin solutions for sustainable decision support systems and intelligent applications
revenueModel: The technologies offered by SNAP4 are 100% open source, license free. Snap4 is supported by providing services on the platform: installation, application development, maintenance, training, customization and development

title: PhytoTech
abstract: PhytoTech offers solutions for environmental management, strategically using plants: from the recovery of contaminated soils to urban regeneration with green infrastructure, provides cutting-edge ecological services.
businessTraction: PhytoTech s.r.l. itself was founded by three entities that have long collaborated fruitfully: CNR, CISA s.p.a. and SOCRATE

In the scenario of conventional remediation technologies, PhytoTech offers:

  • reduced costs
  • environmental benefits (carbon storage, improved soil functionality, increased biodiversity)

The design and implementation of green infrastructure in urban and peri-urban areas presents numerous actors from the field of green management

In collaboration with CISA and SOCRATE, it offers innovative solutions for environmental management, strategically using plants. From the recovery of contaminated soils to urban redevelopment with green infrastructure, it provides cutting-edge ecological services, leveraging CISA’s experience in transforming waste into resources and bioenergy production, and SOCRATES' expertise in environmental advice and engineering.
enablingTechnologies:

  • Monitoring of

    • Landfills

  • Environmental monitoring systems: weather stations, plant phytochemicals and chemical-physical measurements of water
  • Risk analysis services for contaminated sites,Life Cycle Analysis to assess process energy costs and balance environmental impact

revenueModel: B2B
targetCustomers:

  • Chemical, iron and steel, mining and food industries
  • Oil companies and petrochemical industries (e.g. cleaning of fuel outlets)
  • Waste management company (landfill closure and redevelopment)

title: ReWing
abstract: ReWing designs and develops robotic technologies for sensorimotor rehabilitation in patients with orthopedic or neurological outcomes.
businessTraction:
• Part of RoboIT portfolio (CDP National Robotics Technology Transfer Hub), ReWing is supported by a group of Tech Advisors composed by international Companies and Industry experts, including Jacobacci&Partners, AdvantNctm, Arrow and Elemaster
  • Prototype tested on more than 250 patients with orthopaedic or neurological problems and more than 15 prototypes developed were sold to universities and international centers (US, Canada, DE, IT, SG) for scientific research purposes
competitiveAdvantages:
• Mobilization in the 3 degrees of freedom of the wrist; range of movement equal to that of the human; possibility of personalized rehabilitation packages and interconnection of devices via ReWing AI platform

ReWing products support traditional physiotherapy and have advantages for:

  • Hospital managers: cost reduction and resource optimization
  • Therapists: reduction of physical and cognitive stress during their work
  • Patients: greater chance of recovery and a more engaging and positive rehabilitation experience
competitiveScenario:
Major international competitors: Hocoma (CH), Tyromotion (AT), Bionic (USA), Wearable Robotics (IT), Gloreha (IT) and Humanware (IT).
Unlike the ReWing solution, the existing products offer a fixed set of exercises, excluding the possibility of enriching the portfolio of rehabilitation therapies of the doctor and adapting the therapy to different pathologies
description: ReWing designs and develops robotic technologies for sensorimotor rehabilitation in patients with orthopedic or neurological outcomes. The first product is a robot for rehabilitation and functional evaluation of wrist, forearm and hand. The device, a sensorized joystick, is used to perform exercises that look like video games; in the event that the patient cannot perform the movements, the AI of the software connected to the device detects this inability and generates forces on the patient’s arm, in order to assist him dynamically and support him in the process of neural care
enablingTechnologies: Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, Cloud computing
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications:
• Robot for professional use for rehabilitation and sensorimotor evaluation of wrist, forearm and hand, usable with patients with neurological outcomes (e.g. stroke, MS, Parkinson’s) or orthopedic problems (e.g. fractures and trauma)
  • Other possible uses:
    • Research: experimental studies on motor control and ergonomics
    • Sport: quantitative measurement of athletes' performance
  • ReWing AI platform: interconnect ReWing devices to allow data exchange and care continuity
  • ReWing software: SW for rehabilitation or evaluation exercises developed ad hoc
payoff: Rewind to the future.
revenueModel:
• Sales/rental devices (HW+SW base)
  • Sale of additional rehabilitation exercises (possibility of ad hoc development)
  • ReWing AI platform subscription (in the cloud for data exchange, remote therapy and device interconnection)
  • Sale of maintenance services
  • Sales of training courses for staff
targetCustomers: Hospitals and rehabilitation centers the main customers of ReWing, starting from Italy (with more than 1000 centers), later Europe and global expansion in 5 years. Other potential customers will be universities and research institutes that will be able to use ReWing products in their studies

title: SOS-Habitat
abstract: SOS-Habitat specializes in the collection and communication of environmental data, definition of guidelines, environmental design for adaptation to climate change and design of the "corporate identity" of public and private bodies based on environmental sustainability.
competitiveAdvantages:
• Study and development of urban performance indicators and data collection systems
  • Precision detection and measurement
  • Analysis of key environmental parameters
  • Definition of actions and strategies to mitigate and adapt cities to climate change
  • Production of synthesis environmental maps
  • Development of guidelines for the environmental rehabilitation of urban areas
  • Creation of the "corporate identity" of public and private bodies based on environmental sustainability and development of environmental communication plans
  • "Best practices" relating to sustainable development
description: SOS-Habitat deals with urban planning, environmental communication and innovation in relation to environmental issues and climate change. The company specializes in the collection and communication of environmental data, the definition of guidelines, environmental design for adaptation to climate change and the design of "corporate identity" public and private bodies based on environmental sustainability. SOS-Habitat provides services by adopting solutions that promote transparency, environmental sustainability, social inclusion, gender equality
enablingTechnologies:
• Open Data: collection and analysis of publicly available environmental data
  • Environmental Data Diagnosis and Communication Technologies
  • Geographical Information System (GIS) technologies for sustainable design
  • Sustainable Corporate Identity Tools for the definition of "corporate identity"
mainApplications:
Accurately identify the urban areas most at risk from a climate perspective, and then propose the necessary strategies and actions:

  • Data Processing: detecting the environmental parameters of even very limited portions of cities
  • Data Visualization: graphic and interactive map processing, scenario simulation, etc
  • Action Plan and Environmental Communication: identification of interventions and design strategies at the local scale capable of increasing the environmental resilience of even very small portions of urban territory
payoff: Environmental projects and communication for a sustainable habitat
revenueModel: Consultancy services for public and private entities regarding environmental sustainability
targetCustomers:
• Municipalities and public bodies eager to implement environmental sustainability strategies in design at different scales
  • Private companies operating in the building and urban planning sector, especially if they are oriented towards combating climate change

trl.label: 1 - Observation of fundamental principles

title: PersonGene
abstract: PersonGene carries out pharmacogenomic tests aiming at the customization of treatments, that is, the use of drugs or combinations of drugs more suitable for a patient according to his unique genetic heritage.
businessTraction: Commercial agreements and collaborations with Emtesys, DF Medica Italy, DF Medica Poland, DF Medica Brazil, Rukku srl
competitiveAdvantages:
• Easy reading and interpretation of results for both doctors and patients
  • Genetic tests are selected based on strong scientific evidences and recommendations from the FDA and EMA
  • PersonGene identifies a drug adequacy score that takes into account the age, gender and ethnicity of the patient and the weight of the scientific information available for each genetic variant considered. Thanks to this score it is possible to identify the most suitable drug within a group of similar drugs
competitiveScenario: PersonGene pharmacogenetic test optimizes initial and maintenance dosage of several drugs to quickly reach target concentrations and limit dose-related reactions, establishing genetic predisposition for outcome and toxicity for each drug. Tests are available for different diseases (eg., tumors, neuropsychiatric diseases, CVD), configurable for one or more drugs, one or more pathologies
description: PersonGene makes personalized medicine (or Precision medicine) concrete by supporting the concept that personalized medicine is not a medicine for the few, but for everyone. PersonGene carries out pharmacogenomic tests for the use of drugs or combinations of drugs more suitable for a patient according to its specific genetic heritage. PersonGene collaborates with leading organizations in the private, public and social sectors
enablingTechnologies: Next generation sequencing (NGS), Microarray, High-throughput analysis
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received (family&friends, BAs, crowdfunding) with possible transfers of company shares. Funding range: € 5,000 - 50,000
mainApplications:
• Pharmacogenomics
  • Genetic predisposition test for the onset of diseases
  • Nutrigenomics
  • Test for personalized medicine

owners.name: Università degli Studi di Bari Aldo Moro

payoff: Your Genes Your Therapy
revenueModel: B2B (business to business) and B2C (business to consumer)
targetCustomers: Medical Centers, Pharmacies, End Users

title: Proxima Robotics
abstract: Proxima Robotics provides a flexible and NO-CODE software platform to manage the production flow with AGV/AMR.
businessTraction:
The company has partnerships with companies in the sector, including the most important for impact and type of project:

  • Eureka System s.r.l. - Intralogistics
  • Eutronica s.r.l. - Intralogistics
  • R.C.M. s.p.a. - Professional Cleaning

In these projects, new robotic products have been developed, currently marketed and operating
competitiveAdvantages:
• Flexibility and degree of customization and control by the customer
  • Modularity of the SW
  • Interoperability with heterogeneous elements: you can manage fleets of different robots, low level drivers of different brands, different business management systems, without having to rewrite the code
  • Easy to use thanks to a user interface with no-code technology

Interviews in the Italian market also show the need to benefit from a continuous 1-to-1 relationship at the expense of closed box supplies
competitiveScenario:
From research, the market has 13 direct competitors almost all in EU. The most relevant and widespread:

  • Bluebotics (CH): acquired by the Italian Zapi Group. Strength: wide spread in the logistics market. Weakness: HW compatible with their SW
  • Kollmorgen (DE), a multinational motion control company. Strength: market standard with widespread penetration. Weakness: technically rigid solution
description: Proxima Robotics designs and markets the new generation of robots, useful for everyday life, through the new modular software platform that allows the autonomous driving of mobile robots for intra-logistics. The platform, easy to integrate with all major sensors and industrial communication protocols, allows the robot manufacturer and end users, through a no-code web interface, autonomy in changing the behavior of the robot. The product is working on 3 types of robots, for 36 total robots (24 of which are active in areas with high human density)
enablingTechnologies: AI, Autonomous Robot, IoT, System Integration, Digital Tween
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (BAs, incubators, accelerators). Funding range: € 50,001 - 250,000
mainApplications:
• Warehouse intra-logistics
  • Moving goods by means of several robots controlled in the fleet
payoff: A brain for your robot
revenueModel:
4 separate transactions:

  • Customer tailored assessment
  • Setup cost to adapt the SW to customer needs (0 - 30.000€)
  • Licence fee as production cost (1.000 - 5.000€)
  • Monthly fee for each robot between 100€ and 500€ (in SaaS mode) based on features having recurring cost
targetCustomers: The target companies are those operating in manufacturing, which need automation to optimize their processes

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: ReGenFix
abstract: Regenfix has developed a service of complete regeneration of chromatographic columns of type Fplc.
businessTraction: Several paying customers who use the services offered. Some of these have already repeatedly used the services
competitiveAdvantages: The solution offered by the Regenfix regeneration system allows its users to maintain, over time, the performance of their devices at the top. The regenerated columns have in fact the same parameters of efficiency of the new devices
competitiveScenario: To date, no company offers a complete chromatographic column regeneration service. Currently the main manufacturers of columns (e.g. Cytiva) advise their customers to carry out cleaning cycles that, however, do not solve the problem of the elimination of contaminants and, therefore, do not allow to obtain sufficient performance
description: Regenfix has developed a service of complete regeneration of chromatographic columns of Fplc type. After use, the columns accumulate contaminants that alter the results of subsequent tests, and therefore need to be replaced frequently. Regenfix regenerates the devices, bringing them back to their original performance. This means economic savings and less environmental impact (devices could be used indefinitely), also thanks to the lower amount of special waste that is produced
enablingTechnologies: The Regenfix regeneration system is based on a proprietary chemical formula
mainApplications: The Regenfix regeneration process is currently applied to Fplc-type chromatographic columns (mainly used in protein purification). You are potentially able to remove organic contaminants from any matrix, thus expanding the impact of the solution to fields other than Healthcare
payoff: Don't Waste Them, Regenfix Them
revenueModel:
2 regeneration services with performace reports:

  • Basic: regenerated and calibrated chromatographic column
  • Plus: Basic + replacement of missing/deteriorated components and resin loss compensation

Services can also be obtained via annual subscription, saving on the costs of regeneration
targetCustomers: Laboratories using chromatographic columns of type Fplc , SEC, Ion Exchange Liquid Chromatography (research, health, chemistry)

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: Shaking
abstract: Shaking offers services in the field of seismic risk, helping customers assess the safety of existing infrastructure or in their design phase.
competitiveAdvantages: Hazard quantification with scientific-research-level methodologies and numerical codes, for supporting risk-based mitigation strategies
description: Shaking provides services in the field of seismic risk. Specialized in the assessment of seismic hazards, both by shaking the ground and by fault on the surface, we help customers in assessing the safety of existing infrastructure or in the design phase, providing a numerical quantification of shaking or surface fault hazard for the development of strategies based on the concept of permissible risk. We develop or implement analysis procedures and case-specific calculation codes for probability analysis.
enablingTechnologies: Data Analysis
mainApplications: Probabilistic fault displacement and ground shaking seismic hazard analysis, mostly for strategic sites and infrastructure systems
payoff: Field and numerical solutions for seismic hazard and risk assessing
targetCustomers: Engineering companies, energy producers, infrastructure owners, local and national authorities

title: Talia
abstract: Talia realizes and supplies tools for text processing and knowledge extraction based on techniques of Automatic Language Treatment and Artificial Intelligence.
businessTraction: Mondadori Education
competitiveAdvantages:
• Texts analysis from different points of view, combining the different dimensions of analysis to generate knowledge
  • Identification and extraction of the author’s opinions with respect to the extracted information content (analysis of feelings, opinions, identification of hatred or irony)
  • Author profiling via style analysis to recognize for example age, schooling, native language, or verify Autorship Attribution/Plagiarism Detection
  • Analysis of texts of different genres at levels of accuracy that define the state of the art (journalistic, literary, technical, scientific, social media,...)
description:
Talia realizes and supplies tools for text processing and knowledge extraction based on techniques of Automatic Language Treatment and Artificial Intelligence. In particular, it has developed specialized algorithms for:

  • Morphological/syntactic texts analysis
  • Extraction and classification of named entities (proper names, places, products, proteins, body parts,...)
  • Implementation of Question Answering Systems
  • Classification of texts
  • Sentiment analysis
  • Generation of texts and dialogues
  • Organization and clustering of documents
  • Automatic indexing of large text collections
enablingTechnologies: As-a-service and on-premise software, neural network training models, AI algorithms, language resources (e.g. supervised and unsupervised classification, syntactic/semantic analysis, sentiment analysis, question answering and dialog management, natural language generation/understanding)
mainApplications:
• Training models for AI algorithms on vertical domains
  • Creation and extraction of specialized ontologies
  • Annotation of the text corpora
  • Tuning and customization of chat robots, quality control systems and consulting engines
payoff: Talia offers technologies for automatic language analysis
revenueModel:
• Development of vertical IT solutions for language understanding
  • Consulting in computer science, linguistic analysis and training/configuration of AI algorithms
  • Development of platforms/applications for document management and knowledge extraction and management
targetCustomers:
Entities that need to manage business archives, state archives, municipalities, regions, provinces. The totality of industries, productive companies, archives of the armed forces, public administration.

Existing clients: publishers of the creative industry and education (Mondadori, Rizzoli, Erickson etc. ), Public Administration for document management, industry and finance

title: Proteso
abstract: Proteso designs, manufactures and markets robotic exoskeletons to prevent work-related musculoskeletal disorders.
businessTraction: Following an initial period of short-term field trials in partnership with more than ten target companies, we are now proceeding with pilot projects of up to a few months' duration with around 5 target companies.
competitiveAdvantages:
• Greater efficiency and intuitiveness thanks to the active component (robotics), compared to the many passive exoskeletons on the market
  • Ability to collect operating data and information on the movement of workers, thanks to the active component (robotics), absent in the many passive exoskeletons on the market
competitiveScenario: Market populated by passive exoskeletons (no robotic components), with limited effectiveness, and therefore are applicable to limited number of scenarios. Among exoskeleton manufacturers, the majority have only experience with passive devices. In contrast, Proteso has 10 years of R&D experience in active exoskeletons (robotics), making it one of the few companies in the world that can design them
description: Proteso designs, manufactures and markets robotic exoskeletons to prevent work-related musculoskeletal disorders. We help companies avoid associated productivity losses, and workers lead healthier lives without injuries
enablingTechnologies:
Musculoskeletal models & algorithms for real-time control of the robotic part, determining the resulting effectiveness and intuitiveness of active exoskeletons (robotics).
Highly responsive electric actuators typical of human-machine interaction and with form factors specific to wearable applications
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (BAs, incubators, accelerators). Funding range: € 50,001 - 250,000
mainApplications:
• Baggage handling at the airport
  • Cargo handling in logistics
  • Semi-finished handling in manufacturing
payoff: Proteso builds robotic exoskeletons to help industrial workers move better and avoid injuries
revenueModel:
Proteso considers both the option of operating rental and that of direct sales (in Italy with the facilities "Industry 4.0" thanks to the fact that it is a connected product).

Distribution and service agreements with partners already present in the target markets
targetCustomers:
• Third party logistics companies, specifically those that include intralogistics activities (e.g. SDA, Amazon)
  • Medium-large manufacturing companies in various sub-sectors (e.g. Brembo - machinery; Rovagnati - food industry; Vinavil - chemist)
  • Medium to large airports

title: PowerEmp
abstract: PowerEmp designs and manufactures Power Quality measurement systems on power grids to make customers aware and guide them towards energy efficiency solutions and monitoring of their plants.
businessTraction: Financial and commercial partnership with a company leader in the field of power Quality conditioning filters
competitiveAdvantages:
• Autonomous monitoring and diagnostics
  • The sistem in able to autonomously detect, diagnose and generate alerts upon malfunctioning of the plant
competitiveScenario: Low cost, high performances solution. With respect to our competitors our system does not require highly qualified personnel for the use and interpretation of data and can be integrated within Power Quality mitigation systems and electrical management systems
description: PowerEmp designs and manufactures energy and power quality measurement systems on electricity networks to make customers aware and guide them towards energy efficiency solutions and monitoring of their plants. PowerEmp has developed and patented Smart Plug, a monitoring and diagnosis system on electrical networks capable of generating automatic reporting. It can be integrated into Power Quality mitigation and electrical system management systems. PowerEmp also offers consulting services on Power Quality issues and energy efficiency

mainApplications: Electrical Plant monitoring and diagnostics
payoff: Poweremp - Power under control

title: RiAtlas
abstract: RiAtlas has developed a Medical Device Software (RiAtlas Healthcare) for the management and active monitoring of patients starting a home care therapeutic path.
businessTraction:
• Novartis: partnership for Digital Patient Support System projects (monitoring adherence to therapy/drugs and encouraging active participation in the treatment path)
  • IRCCS Fondazione G. Pascale: remote management and monitoring of cancer patients (post-acute phase)
  • Nemo Clinical Centre: remote management and monitoring of patients with neuromuscular diseases
  • Innovation and technology transfer projects carried out in centres of excellence
competitiveAdvantages:
• Health status classification according to recognized scales and taxonomies (ICF of the WHO) from clinical data (e.g. self-report, medical records)
  • Visualization of patient data using assessment/assessment scales (e.g. EORTC QLQ-C30, CTCAE adverse events)
  • Alerting for active therapy monitoring and early risk detection (adverse events, functional deficits, side effects,...)
  • Interoperability with healthcare systems (HL7-FHIR standard)
  • Patient involvement (autonomy, motivation,...) and operator satisfaction (e.g. decision support, lower risk of error)
competitiveScenario:
Startups, providers of medical SW (Kaiku, Voluntis/ Oleena, PatchAI, MoovCare, Cankado): feed independent data silos, lacking in classifying the health status of the patient, acquire vital signs in real time, compliance to health interoperability std (HL7 FHIR).
There is no evidence of integrated "all-in-one" MD solutions (clinical+patient app, wearable/monitoring devices, AI)
description: RiAtlas, innovative SME, has developed a Medical Device Software (RiAtlas Healthcare), for the management and active monitoring of patients, who start a home care therapeutic path. RiAtlas Healthcare (software STAND ALONE) aims to support the clinical decisions of health professionals and improve the quality of life of the patient, encouraging the active participation of the patient in their treatment path. The users of the solution are medical specialists (web apps) and patients (mobile apps).
enablingTechnologies: AI, IoT, Big data analytics
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications:
The therapeutic areas covered by the medical device are:

  • Cancer patients (ICD-9, range 140-239)
  • Patients with neurological diseases (ICD-9, range 320-389 and range 430-438)
payoff: Technology that focuses on people’s health and well-being
revenueModel: B2B via partnership/distribution. Sale of RiAtlas Healthcare and specialist services (e.g. customizations, integrations, data intelligence AI). Monthly fee for the service "turnkey" (SaaS) for each patient, including the loan of use of device for the collection of vital signs
targetCustomers:
• Pharmaceutical companies
  • Home-care providers and medical device distributors

trl.label: 8 - Complete system definition and qualification

title: OPTIMeasy
abstract: OPTIMeasy deals with the study, development, production and marketing of methods and solutions aimed at optimising decision-making and operational processes mainly in the Logistics and Transport sectors.
businessTraction:
Two multi-annual partnerships for IT and systems support and joint development of projects:

  • CIRCLE GROUP (specialized in analysis of the harbour, marine and logistic policies international, supply of solutions advanced IT and products SW for harbour terminals, operators of the multimodale transport, railway companies, harbour authorities and network, marine agencies)
  • IROI (SW products for manufacturing and logistics planning)
competitiveAdvantages: Holistic approach to the problem, starting from the accurate analysis of the needs and objectives that you want to achieve thanks to the application of an optimization system, through the collection and accurate modeling of the constraints to be respected in achieving the goal. The support of OPTIMeasy is not only focused on technological/informative or analytical aspects, but is able to combine the vision of computer science, economics, mathematics and design as a whole, in order to satisfy the customer with the solution that best follows his needs
competitiveScenario:
The competitive advantage concerns:

  • interdisciplinarity and transversal competences in various fields (economic, logistic, trasportistico)
  • willingness to deal with real problems with quantitative instruments
  • full support for the development of optimization models and customized operations research approaches
description: OPTIMeasy offers a simple approach to obtain decision support tools that bring a competitive advantage, consisting of supporting companies in the efficient and organized management of processes and decisions. Specifically, OPTIMeasy deals with the study, development, production and marketing of methods, models and solutions typical of Operations Research aimed at optimising decision-making and operational processes mainly in the Logistics and Transport sectors
enablingTechnologies: Analytics, Data integration, Data Visualization, Software, Models and Optimization Algorithms and Operations Research, Python, Decision Support Systems, Heuristic Approaches/Algorithms, Linear Programming, Simulation
mainApplications:
Support for optimizing business processes whether they are decision-making or operational. Applications so far:

  • Scheduling & Re-schedulationzione railway activity in harbour within
  • Truck triangulation of a railway junction for Multi Modal Transport Operator
  • Optimization of cruise itineraries
payoff: The easiest way to optimize your decisions
revenueModel: Offer of a steps service that can be purchased as a whole or in part, after a specific customized economic offer and some preliminary meetings so that we can support and accompany the customer in the journey
targetCustomers:
Companies:

  • SW development to exploit and integrate optimization models and/or algorithms to improve process efficiency
  • logistics that want to seek efficiency improvements with the support of optimization
  • freight transport and/or passengers who want to achieve improvements in the organization and/or operation also through the analysis of scenarios

trl.label: 8 - Complete system definition and qualification

title: Novavido
abstract: Novavido is developing a device, the liquid retina, that could potentially replace photoreceptors damaged by retinal degeneration and recover vision in the entire visual field.
businessTraction:
The startup has already led substantial AUCAP. Among investors:

  • Alfasigma S.p.A.
  • Istituto David Chiossone ONLUS
  • G-Factor S.r.l.
  • Utopia S.I.S.
competitiveAdvantages: Compared to gene therapy, our solution is applicable to an extremely larger audience of patients. Compared to other retinal prostheses, it allows recovery without the need for external energy sources, such as batteries, and without the use of visors, thus maintaining a function more similar to physiological vision
competitiveScenario: On the market there are solutions based on gene therapy that allow partial recovery of visual function, for specific genetic defects, limiting the number of beneficiary patients. There are different types of retinal prostheses that use electrodes or photovoltaic cells implanted in the eye, but none reaches significant levels of diffusion due to the complicated use
description: Novavido is a start-up focused on the development of retinal prostheses. Born from the results of a long-standing collaboration between the Italian Institute of Technology and the IRCCS Ospedale Sacro Cuore Don Calabria, the company is working to create an innovative medical device based on nanotechnologies for the recovery of vision in patients suffering from retinitis pigmentosa. The startup is working on a disruptive technology based on the use of a photovoltaic polymer and nanoparticles
enablingTechnologies:
• Photostimulation technology using organic photoactive materials (polyethylene)
  • Development of polysilthiophene nanoparticles
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications: Recovery of visual function in retinal degeneration contexts (retinitis pigmentosa and macular degeneration)
payoff: See the future together
revenueModel: Novavido will produce its own medical device, and will sell it directly in a B2B2C model
targetCustomers: Target customers will mainly be hospitals and clinics specialized in the ophthalmic sector. It will also include national health services, insurance and non-profit organizations that can act as intermediaries to cover patients' expenses

title: Vision 2050
abstract: Vision 2050 is primarily concerned with non-financial reporting through ESG ratings through innovative technologies such as dashboards and big data analytics.
businessTraction: Collaborations with: Città Metropolitana di Torino, Regione Piemonte, Teoresi, Croce Rossa Italiana
competitiveAdvantages: Vision 2050 expert solutions and advisory provide turnkey solutions for multiple impact reporting by projects or entities
competitiveScenario: In the competitive scenario of the credit rating advisory industry, Vision stands out for its in-depth theoretical expertise and the practical application of analysis, with highly accurate and personalised credit risk assessments. Competition from large rating agencies and financial advisory firms offering similar services but with a less personalised approach
description: Vision 2050 integrates science and management with certified experts in marketing, finance, statistics and "Social Impact Assessors". Vision is an innovative startup that deals primarily with non-financial reporting through ESG ratings through innovative technologies such as dashboards and big data analytics. In addition, they complete the advisory activities regarding the new regulations for the reporting of sustainability and environmental, social and governance aspects
enablingTechnologies: Big data analytics, use of innovative dashboards and artificial intelligence
fundingStageDescription: Non-repayable funding has been received from entities, without transferring company shares

The ratings and assessments of Vision 2050 srl include the social impact of national, European or international projects of a single entity or multiple reference entities. Among the applications under study and validation:

  • rating diversity management
  • ESG compliant rating
  • social impact assessment ratings for European projects (Erasmus+ or multiple European programmes)
payoff: By your side every step of the way
revenueModel: The revenue model is structured to ensure sustainable remuneration and reflect the high value of the skills and analysis provided. Project-based pricing model, with fees determined by the complexity, duration and resources needed for each assignment

trl.label: 5 - Technological validation in an industrial environment

title: ToothPic
abstract: ToothPic has developed the only non-clonable and passwordless smartphone-based authentication solution that leverages the camera’s unique sensor features to ensure a high level of security.
businessTraction:
• PoC with Poste Italiane: security of the authentication process (employees/customers) and authorisation of payment. Other applications are being evaluated (digital identity management, anti-fraud, digital signature, encrypted document exchange)
  • In use by
    • CSI Piemonte, PA system integrator, for secure authentication process
    • Intesi Group, data security provider, for the security of OTP-based authentication methods
  • Insurance project with Intesa Sanpaolo Assicura
competitiveAdvantages:
• Unclonable and highly secure technology
  • Passwordless and frictionless User experience
  • Fast access
  • Lower TCO
  • Highly scalable solution
competitiveScenario:
2 groups of competitors:

  • large provider companies (Okta, Thales/Gemalto, Cisco/Duo) with a diverse portfolio of authentication solutions. Potential partners as ToothPic technology can be integrated into their products to boost security
  • direct competitors (Transmit Security, Secret Double Octopus, HYPR) that offer a smartphone-based authentication system
description: ToothPic is the first and only passwordless smartphone-based authentication solution that, using the unique features of the device’s camera sensor, makes digital identity unclonable and guarantees an extreme level of security during the authentication process. The technology is currently protected by 4 international patents. ToothPic secures the MFA process by encrypting keys on smartphones through a secret extracted from a hardware characteristic of the device itself: the unique and unclonable pattern of manufacturing imperfections of camera sensors.
enablingTechnologies: Recognition of the smartphone via a unique pattern of the camera sensor pixels, linked to random physical properties of the silicon, resulting in a non-sclonable physical feature (PUF). Technology implemented in SDK (Android,iOS) that enables standard asymmetric key protection
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications:
• Authentication
  • Anti-fraud
  • Digital signature
  • Encryption of documents
  • OTT services
  • Mobile Car Key
payoff: The only unclonable passwordless authentication based on your smarphone hardware
revenueModel: The sales channel can be either through the internal sales force of ToothPic or through partnerships with system integrators, and producers of complementary technologies. The revenue model is based on a periodic license fee per user, typically on an annual basis.
targetCustomers: Large companies in the financial sector, Public Administration, Government and Defense

title: Nanophoria
abstract: NanoPhoria offers inhalable nanotherapeutic formulations for non-invasive and selective heart treatments.
businessTraction:
• CNR, several institutes such as ISSMC (nanoparticle platform development), IRGB (in vitro and in vivo preclinical models), IFC (large animal dose-response models)
  • Plumestars srl (development of inhalation products)
  • Genscript inc (supply of peptides and nucleic acids)
  • Xedev BV (spray-dry technology development)
  • Company LabCorp. (preclinical tests)
competitiveAdvantages:
• Pioneering mimetic peptide combined with an unconventional route of drug administration from lung to heart via inhalable biocompatible nano-vectors
  • Inhalable therapeutic nanoformulation for non-invasive and selective treatment of the heart
  • Minimal side effects and selective delivery to the target of the pharmaceutical active ingredient
competitiveScenario: NanoPhoria offers benefits for both target customers (Big Pharma) and end users (HFrEF patients). NanoPhoria offers the only "Disease Modifyng Drug" on the market that acts against the pathological processes of HFrEF, restoring the physiological level of the myocardial ejection fraction, improving patient expectation and quality of life.
description: NanoPhoria, a preclinical biotechnology company, develops inhalable cardiovascular treatments using a proprietary, non-viral platform for the administration of biological drugs via nanoparticles. The flagship product is an inhalable nano-in-micro formulation designed to provide heart cells with a proprietary "best in class" peptide that modulates the L-type calcium channel, which has proven effective in small and large animal models for the treatment of heart failure with reduced ejection fraction (HFrEF).
enablingTechnologies: Nanomedicine, nano-vectors, mimetic peptides
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (BAs, incubators, accelerators). Funding range: € 50,001 - 250,000
mainApplications:
• Delivery of active biological substances such as peptides, RNA or DNA
  • Inhalable therapeutic nanoformulations for non-invasive and selective heart treatments.

The entry lead product is an inhalable nanoparticle formulation enriched with an active biopharmaceutical ingredient for HFrEF treatment. The bioactive ingredient, a mimetic peptide (MP), acts as a corrective non-arrhythmogenic molecule that restores the contractile properties of the diseased heart. Nanoparticle-based release facilitates enrichment and release of MP into heart cells.
payoff: Pioneering Inhalable CardioVascular Treatments via Non-Viral Nano-Delivery of Biologics
revenueModel: Milestone and royalty based payments arising from the licensing of proprietary products and also from the licensing of specific applications of our drug delivery system
targetCustomers: Multinational pharmaceutical companies (e.g. Bayer, SANOFI, Novartis, Astra Zeneca, Lilly, Boehringer, Amgen.) active in the market, which will undertake to acquire or license biotechnological PPE once the products have demonstrated safety and efficacy in phase II clinical trials

trl.label: 5 - Technological validation in an industrial environment

title: Spin Life
abstract: Spin Life provides environmental management and sustainability management skills and knowledge to businesses and public administrations.
businessTraction:
• AFV Beltrame Group and Alperia
  • Firema and Tecno ESG
competitiveAdvantages:
• Scientific Method: critical analysis of the context in which organizations operate, in order to define the strategic framework that allows to maximize the efficiency and effectiveness of services
  • Innovate and implement: detailed analysis of the processes of organizations to identify critical issues and opportunities for improvement
  • Improve and certify: technological and management solutions that allow to certify products and processes according to the ISO standards of interest
  • Communicating: developing content for the communication of sustainability at the product and organization level
description: Spin Life offers public and private organisations specific consulting plans on strategic environmental management and sustainability management techniques. The group operates in the following macro-areas: Life Cycle Assessment studies, product and organization certifications, strategic services for corporate sustainability, Carbon Neutrality, research and innovation on environmental issues. Spin Life experiments innovative approaches, translating them into concrete solutions for the sustainability, efficiency and competitiveness of the companies and public administrations with which it works.
enablingTechnologies: Data Analysis
mainApplications:
• Life Cycle Assessment, Footprint & Environmental Product Certification: quantification of the potential environmental impacts that intervene in the life cycle of products or services, with input and output evaluations of matter and energy processes
  • Carbon strategy: consultancy services related to quantification, mitigation and neutralisation of greenhouse gas emissions in order to reduce the impact on climate change
  • Services for corporate sustainability: aimed at public and private sector organizations in the field of sustainable business management
payoff: Business advice for the environmental sustainability of your products and your organization
targetCustomers: Public and private organizations

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: Stat4Value
abstract: Your strategic partner for the customized development of software solutions that can manage, harmonize and analyze your business data, helping to make it thriving and competitive.
competitiveAdvantages:
• Ease of use
  • Adaptability to every device
  • Customizable in every aspect
  • Reduce uptime and improve globally in company decision-making, both tactical and strategic
  • Increased ability to extract cognitive and economic value from data to boost your business
  • Significant increase in operational efficiency where professionalism and efficiency go hand in hand
  • Important increase of the competitive advantage on the competitors, become central element in the strategic management of the enterprise
competitiveScenario: Several Data Mining SW manufacturers and companies in the field of consulting/ management and data analysis through cloud services (e.g. Google AI, Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, Qlik). Their offer is little customizable, and partially overlaps that of Stat4value, whose activity aims to associate to the SW services intended to accompany the company with a scientific expertise
description: Stat4value offers a SW platform DataMIND (Data Modular Integration Driver), declined in a highly modular web-based architecture, prepared for possible integrations with business systems, with the collection of data through applications (desktop or mobile app) which may include diversified modules for the collection and homogeneous management of data and big data, and for their processing with Advanced Analytics and Machine Learning technologies.
enablingTechnologies: Advanced Analytics, Machine Learning, Design of Experiments, Big Data Process, Business Intelligens, Data Warehouse
mainApplications:
• Integration of Databases
  • Creation of a Data Warehouse
  • Data Analysis and Big Data
  • Real time analysis
  • Business Intelligence
  • Predictive maintenance
  • Efficiency assessment Business processes and performance

revenueModel: Structured sales contracts: variable revenues depending on customer size, demand, amount of hours needed to perform the work. In addition, requests for additional modules to be added to the initial contracted solution can be expected.
targetCustomers: Medium to large private companies operating in the field of "fast-moving consumer goods", but at the same time that can offer various advantages and opportunities to those who work in the public sector. Diverse fields, such as retail, manufacturing, banks, healthcare, companies interested in implementing data-based decision-making and Big Data according to a data-driven approach.

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: Audio Innova
abstract: Audio Innova offers products and services for acoustic information restoration and preservation and for the enhancement of tangible and intangible cultural heritage.
businessTraction: Audio Innova won the "Creative AI" section award at the World Artificial Intelligence Cannes Festival, the most important artificial intelligence festival in Europe. for two consecutive editions: in 2023 and 2024.
competitiveAdvantages: • Possibility of creating custom software
description:
Created by the Department of Information Engineering excellence of the University of Padua, Audio Innova is specialized in the preservation of analog sound documents and realizes the transfer of acoustic information into digital domain.
Audio Innova Ltd. is one of the founding members of Moving Picture, Audio and Data Coding by Artificial Intelligence (MPAI), a nonprofit organization that develops standards for data coding in ICT systems using Artificial Intelligence
enablingTechnologies:
• Artificial Intelligence
  • Machine Learning
  • Digital Signal Processing
  • Computer Vision
  • Technologies For Augmented Learning
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
