  • Analog and digital audio archives (music, speech and other sounds)
  • Live performance and multimedia installations
  • Web-based audio applications
  • Audio restoration and enhancement
  • Music information retrieval
payoff: Audio Innova is the start-up bringing innovation in sound cultural heritage.
targetCustomers:
• Museums
  • Cultural organizations and associations
  • Recording studios

trl.label: 5 - Technological validation in an industrial environment

title: TOXMED
abstract: TOXMED specializes in chemical and toxicological analysis in the GLP/GLP environment of various matrices. It offers services and advice in the field of food, toxicology, forensics and plant protection products.
businessTraction: Collaborations with Universities, such as: University of London (UCL), University of Lexeter (UK), Martin-Luther-Universität Halle-Wittenberg (DE)
competitiveAdvantages: In reference to the new urinary biomarker of disease, the advantage is to be a non-invasive test. At the moment these diseases are diagnosed with a muscle biopsy.
description: TOXMED carries out research and consultancy activities in the food and toxicological-forensic field. The company provides chemical analysis to research xenobiotic substances, drugs and drugs on different matrices. In addition, it provides studies of product innovation related to quality, typicality and safety of production and food chains, and enhancement of the by-products of processing. Finally, it provides advice for the study and preparation of new formulations of plant protection products and substances with biological activity
enablingTechnologies: Mass spectrometry
fundingStageDescription: Non-repayable funding has been received from entities, without transferring company shares
mainApplications:
• Toxicology in the medical, pharmaceutical and agri-food field (intoxication by abuse substances, doping substances, drug exposure monitoring, occupational toxicology)
  • Toxicological advice on biocidal, biostimulant and phytosanitary products (preliminary toxicity and ecotoxicity studies, determination and characterisation of impurities)

In particular, TOXMED has developed a urinary biomarker in the field of rare genetic myopathies
payoff: GLP Lab - AGRIFOOD and BIOMED
revenueModel:
Consulting services, sample analysis.

With regard to rare genetic myopathies, once the method for the determination of the biomarker has been patented, an attempt will be made to sell the patent
targetCustomers: Aziende dei settori alimentare e tossicologico-forense

trl.label: 3 - Experimental proof of concept

title: ANCHARIA
abstract: Ancharia is an innovative cybersecurity startup founded by a team of cybersecurity experts to provide advanced, high-tech solutions to protect organizations from growing cyber threats, ensuring data and system security.
businessTraction:
ANCHARIA includes in its corporate structure two local ICT companies: Bimind and Impronta srl
The project “ALAB: Lab for software and network security assessment” proposed by ANCHARIA for the creation and equipment of a certified testing laboratory has been funded by European Union “NextGenerationEU” (PNRR M1C1I1.5).
ANCHARIA collaborates with the National Competence Center for Cybersecurity Cyber ​​4.0 and is part of the UNIVPM instructors of the CyberChallenge.IT
competitiveAdvantages: In just a few minutes FAST is able to measure the cyber risk of an organization seen from the outside (Internet).
description:
ANCHARIA is an innovative startup and a university spin-off operating in the field of cybersecurity. It provides high-value services, academic know-how and expertise, and training of new talents.

ANCHARIA offers custom software design and development to meet specific needs of SMEs.

ANCHARIA offers the following services:

  • Network Penetration Test
  • Web App Penetration Test
  • Vulnerability Assessment
  • Malware Detection
  • Cyber Risk Assessment
  • Cybersecurity Gap Analysis
  • Phishing Campaign Simulation
  • Professional Training in Cybersecurity
enablingTechnologies: Cyber Threat Intelligence
fundingStageDescription: Non-repayable funding has been received from entities, without transferring company shares
mainApplications: ANCHARIA developed a new (proprietary) software called FAST for the passive collection of information on the cyber exposure of a company or organization (subdomains of the scanned domain, associated IP addresses, active services, IP reputation, any CVEs and exploits, company credentials that have fallen victim to data breaches and domains similar to the target one). The software provides an indicator called "FAST Score" to quantify the cyber risk of the target organization.
payoff: Advanced solutions for Cybersecurity
revenueModel: Sale of user licenses
targetCustomers: SMEs

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: T-REM3DIE
abstract: T-REM3DIE provides innovative technology to transform a tendon and ligament injury from permanent disability to temporary discomfort, ensuring hospitals, doctors and especially the patient, less difficulty in managing this problem.
businessTraction: PoC Eureka- industrial testing
competitiveAdvantages:
• Easy to implant, easily removed in case of positioning error or breakage
  • Reduces scar stimulation due to the use of suture threads or device cleavages
  • Reduces the probability of failure due to breakage or breakage of the knot, with reduced traumatic putting in place
  • Allows a guided reconstruction of the tendon or ligament
  • Ensures the reduction of ischemia points
  • Results in less tissue deformity of the affected area and less perilesional inflammatory reaction
  • Bioabsorbable and biocompatible polymer material
competitiveScenario: T- REM3DIE, distributing the stresses in the plant site, allows an improvement in the sealing capacity of the repair compared to traditional sutures and other solutions that have cracking elements. In addition, it reduces the risk of lacerations and tissue suffering. Compared to the technologies on the market it is made of bioreassorbible material and does not stay in the body for a long time.
description: T-REM3DIE (Tendon Repair Medical Device) is a biocompatible and biodegradable implantable device for the repair of tendons and ligaments that presents itself as a bioabsorbable membrane whose main objective is to avoid the need to suture the severed tendon, allow a rapid rehabilitation early passive mobilization whose purpose is to prevent the formation of adhesions due to immobilization of the limb.
enablingTechnologies: Biocompatible and bioreassorbible polymer materials, design and design of implantable medical devices
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications:
• Medical field in which are provided two different lines:
    • Default (pre-defined) sizes for standard and common cases, accident, and emergency. Different sized on the tendon involved (hand, Achilles, etc)
    • Customized sizes for planned operations and/or customers with particular needs (athletes, surgeons, etc) or very specific cases (e.g. children with very small tendons, rare pathologies, etc)
  • Veterinary field, which is mainly composed of racehorses, for this niche the device has different configurations and sizes according to the target segment.
payoff: Bring back the emotion of Motion
revenueModel: B2B offering standard products for the medical and veterinary sector and a range of products tailored to the medical sector.
targetCustomers: Specialists surgeons, private and public clinics, veterinarians and veterinary clinics

trl.label: 5 - Technological validation in an industrial environment

title: SMART MOLD
abstract: Smart Mold reduces the environmental impact of plastics by developing innovative injection molding technologies and optimizing the design of plastic parts using recycled materials.
competitiveAdvantages:
• Support in the engineering phase of the components to identify aesthetic and structural problems in the preliminary stages, allowing to reduce production time and costs
  • Replacement of metal parts with thermoplastic polymers treated by injection molding, favouring:
    • Reduction of component mass
    • Productivity increase
    • Increased performance and efficiency
    • High degree of process automation
    • High precision and precision manufacturing
    • Recycling
description: Smart Mold uses proprietary GAPP (Gas Assisted Injection Molding) injection molding technology that improves flow control in cavities, eliminating process-induced defects and optimizing the local morphology of the molded part. Thanks to GAPP technology, maximum performance can be achieved from a material in the injection moulding process of fiber-reinforced thermoplastics
enablingTechnologies: Simulation software, mold coatings, gas assisted push-pull
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (BAs, incubators, accelerators). Funding range: € 50,001 - 250,000
mainApplications:
• Product, mold and process design
  • Identification of the most critical areas of components, proposing improvement solutions through the ANSYS® structural simulation SW
  • Starting from the tested part, Smart Mold offers the possibility to analyze in detail the fracture surface to identify the origin and mode of the fault and consequently to isolate the critical problems to be considered
payoff: Injection Molding Solutions
revenueModel: B2B
targetCustomers: Companies in sectors such as automotive, household appliances, electrical and electronic

trl.label: 5 - Technological validation in an industrial environment

title: EuBiome
abstract: Together with veterinary doctors, EuBiome makes fecal transplantation accessible to combat dysbiosis in chronic enteropathies and atopic dermatitis to make everyone happier: dogs and cats, and their owners.
competitiveAdvantages:
• Easily accessible to enteropathic dogs and cats thanks to freeze-dried capsules
  • Without side effects
  • Effective in over 80% of enteropathic animals
description: EuBiome is aimed at veterinarians with the aim of helping them to introduce fecal transplantation into clinical practice to treat dogs and cats with chronic enteropathies, restoring the balance of the microbiome. It proposes veterinarians and owners to participate in Pet FMT, a citizen science project through which data and experiences will be collected to make transplantation more effective. It’s simple, safe, with virtually no side effects, and it’s natural because dog and cat are coprophagous. It brings improvements to over 80% of enteropathic animals
enablingTechnologies: Transplants, new medicines
mainApplications:
• Dysbiosis in chronic animal enteropathies
  • Atopic dermatitis of animals
payoff: We make dogs and cats happier by fighting chronic enteropathies through fecal microbiome transplantation
revenueModel: B2B
targetCustomers: Veterinarians and veterinary clinics

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: MOVE-mentis
abstract: MOVE-mentis realizes HW and SW solutions for the evaluation of the psycho-physical well-being, also with reference to posture and movement, and evidence-based analysis to support the decisions adopted in the health system.
competitiveAdvantages:
• 3D representation of posture and movement for management, visualization and interpretation of the collected data
  • Decision support for defining a personalized exercise program
competitiveScenario:
Companies such as AXS MEDICAL (FR), DIERS Biomedical solutions (DE), PhysicalTECH (ES), VICON (US), ALFOOTS (KR), CHINESPORT (IT) develop image acquisition products alongside processing SW to extract information.
MOVE-mentis reproduces postural problems on 3D avatars and supports reporting. Integrates with motion sensors and physiological parameters
description:
MOVE-mentis integrates research & development to realize:

  • HW and SW solutions for the evaluation of psycho-physical well-being, also with regard to posture and movement
  • evidence-based analysis to support the decisions taken in the health system.

In particular, he created the MOVE-ME software solution for the 3D assessment of posture. To date, it has been implemented by adopting the Postural Channels method®. in the version MOVE-ME CHANNELS, allowing in a simple and immediate way to detect and correct postural problems and can therefore be used in sports and health
enablingTechnologies:
• Digital Tween (computer reproduction of the complexity of the physiological connections at the base of the posture).
  • Adoption of motion sensing devices, and not only, integrated with the platform (System integration)
  • Telehealth: monitoring and managing patients/subjects remotely
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received (family&friends, BAs, crowdfunding) with possible transfers of company shares. Funding range: € 5,000 - 50,000
mainApplications:
• Postural evaluation by posturologists, orthopedists, physiatrists
  • Exercise monitoring (after further developments involving integration with motion measurement sensors)
  • Use in clinical settings for space body measurements and patient data storage
payoff: HW/SW solutions for psycho-physical well-being (posture and movement) and Health Technology Assessment
revenueModel: The product will be marketed through the payment by the customer of a licence fee, with progressive discounts, over time, to encourage loyalty.
targetCustomers: First potential clients are operators (graduates in physical sciences, physiotherapists, physiatrists, osteopaths) who attend training courses through the Postural Channels Method (method of analysis and posture correction implemented in the product). Thanks to the integration of wearable sensors, the market will also open professionals (family doctors, pediatricians, physiatrists, orthopedists)

trl.label: 4 - Technological validation in a laboratory environment

title: Grid+
abstract:
Industrial transfer of services based on algorithmic solutions related to the Artificial Intelligence (AI) paradigm, which promote digital transformation and the improvement of decision-making processes of companies operating in the smart energy management and
smart logistics
businessTraction: Reeturn, Manet, Bix&Co, ILPConsulting
competitiveAdvantages:
The growing need to optimize processes, reduce costs and improve sustainability is pushing companies to invest in digital technologies and AI-based solutions.
Grid+ valorises the large amount of data generated by a company with AI as a Service solutions. The Company will not need to manage the complexity of these technologies in-house, nor will it have to invest in dedicated resources and hardware.
description:
Grid+' objective is to design, develop, create and market innovative hardware and software devices and systems, mainly based on the Artificial Intelligence as a Service paradigm, aimed at creating flexible and customised solutions in the field of networked services. The main areas of application are:

  • smart energy management
  • smart logistics
enablingTechnologies:
Advanced computational intelligence technologies (distributed algorithms, hyperdimensional computing, quantum computing, graph neural networks) and deep learning (deep neural networks, deep autoencoders, explainable AI).
AIaaS infrastructure to offer services accessible via the cloud.
mainApplications:
• Forecasting
  • Condition Monitoring
  • ustomer Profiling
  • Business Intelligence
  • Image Processing
  • Data Mining
payoff: Unlock your business potential through AI
revenueModel: The business model is based on the sale of network analysis and management services through its AIaaS platform, as well as personalized consultancy services. In line with the growth of the market segment, a notable increase in sales is expected in the short, medium and long term.
targetCustomers: Companies operating in the sectors: smart energy management and smart logistics, which need to adopt digital technologies such as AI, IoT and robotics

trl.label: 6 - Demonstration of technology in an industrial environment

title: Nepsy
abstract: NEPSY develops highly integrated multi-source electric propulsion systems, which use synergistically energy storage systems with complementary characteristics.
businessTraction:
Collaborations with:

  • University of Cagliari
  • University of Parma
competitiveAdvantages:
• Develop highly integrated propulsion systems
  • Configurable according to specific needs

NEPSY has developed the prototype of electric propulsion system for boats (project POSEIDON, POR FESR SARDEGNA 2014-2020), consisting of hybrid electric storage system (batteries and supercapacitors), multilevel converter, permanent magnet synchronous electric machine. HW and SW integration ensures high performance, such as optimal regulation of energy flows, high power and energy density, and rapid dynamic response
competitiveScenario:
Various companies of electric propulsion systems for pleasure boating. Tendency to offer similar products in power ranges:

  • ePropulsion, Aquamot: low power propulsion (< 6 kW)
  • Aquawatt: medium power outboard motors (5-50 kW)

Or to differentiate themselves:

  • Torqeedo: high power inboard/outboard systems, different applications
  • Oceanvolt: propulsion systems for sailing boats
description:
NEPSY develops integrated, flexible and needs-based electric propulsion systems for road, rail and marine propulsion applications. The competences of NEPSY are:

  1. electronic power converters: modeling, multilevel converters, pulse width modulation
  2. high speed permanent magnet electric machines, finite element analysis
  3. Electrical drives (strategies and advanced management and control techniques, FPGA-based algorithms)
  4. energy storage systems (energy management and control systems, hybrid storage systems)
enablingTechnologies:
• Hybrid storage systems (units connected to each other and to the electric propulsion motor/power grid) via multilevel converter
  • Electric propulsion motor (permanent magnet synchronous electric machine, brushless type DC)
  • Propulsion system management and control systems
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications: Applications of road propulsion (motorcycles, light vehicles, buses, etc.), railway (trams, subways, trains, etc.) and naval (small and medium boats) and, more generally, in the industrial and civil fields (lifts, lifting and handling systems, etc.)
payoff: Towards the future of mobility
revenueModel: B2B, with customization of electric propulsion systems, based on needs
targetCustomers: Road vehicles (motorcycles, light vehicles, bus, etc.) producers, railway vehicles (tram, metro, trains, etc.) producers, vessels (small- and medium-size vessels) producers, and more generally for industrial and civil propulsion applications (elevators, lifting and handling euipment, etc.)

trl.label: 6 - Demonstration of technology in an industrial environment

title: Moi composites
abstract: Moi revolutionizes the production of high performance composite products through the global digitalization of the Additive Manufacturing process.
businessTraction:
• 19 awards (the last is the Seal of Excellence)
  • Partnership: Kuka, Owens Corning, Huntsmann, Rhan
competitiveAdvantages:
• Digitalization of production process
  • Repeatability and precision
  • Production of components using high performance materials, in optimized morphologies
  • Possibility of producing very complex shapes, impossible to create with other technologies
  • Anisotropy exploitation, orienting the fibers according to the load expected
  • Process scalablility
  • No material waste
competitiveScenario: In composites 3D printing segment there are very few companies capable of creating continuous fiber composite parts. Only one direct competitor, Continuous Composites, a startup based in the USA
description: Moi Composites’ Continuous Fiber Manufacturing (CFM) technology represents a new technology innovation. A patented, disruptive Additive Manufacturing (AM) technology aiming at the complete automation in advanced continuous fiber reinforced composites production without molds for better, more affordable, high-performance products in optimized shapes
enablingTechnologies:
Continuous Fiber Manufacturing (CFM), proprietary process based on Additive Manufacturing, consisting of:

  • End-effector installed on robotic platform or CNC system
  • CAM software based on proprietary algorithms
  • Systems Thermosetting resin curing Quick, to react and harden in situ
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (BAs, incubators, accelerators). Funding range: € 50,001 - 250,000
mainApplications: CFM technology enables the digital production continuous fiber composite parts, which can be used in several sectors such as aerospace, automotive, marine, oil & gas, sports and biomedical. Also, in 2020 Moi composites incorporated Moi dental srl, a controlled startup, which uses the CFM system to produce for dental prosthesis reinforcements (www.hi-fiber.it)
payoff: Composites production made simple
revenueModel:
B2B with hybrid revenue stream:

  • single sale (i.e. one-time-purchase model) of HW for business partners and technology integrators
  • recurring revenue from the sale of consumables (consumption based model) and software licenses (licensing model)
targetCustomers: Manufacturers in sectors such as architecture, marine, biomedical, aerospace, defence, automotive and sports, who are looking for digital processes to produce high-performance products

trl.label: 6 - Demonstration of technology in an industrial environment

title: FieldRobotics
abstract: Hybrid robotic systems for monitoring and carrying out activities in agriculture and in the S&R (Search&Rescue) field. Equipped with AI and able to process data collected during their operation, they offer full decision support.
businessTraction:
Technology tested in collaboration with the Fire Department and the National Alpine & Speleological Rescue Corps (drones), with 100+ hours of flight. The terrestrial rovers were tested during a pilot project with the Agricultural Company of the University of Bologna, with 800+ hours of autonomous navigation. Currently the company cooperates with:

  • Bonfiglioli SpA, industry partner
  • Nobili SpA, industry partner
  • Martignani Srl, industry partner
  • CAAB SpA - Centro Agroalimentare Bologna, business partner
competitiveAdvantages:
• Autonomous navigation system based on lidar, efficient even in case of no GPS coverage
  • Artificial Intelligence application for object recognition, image segmentation and data-driven predictions (size of agricultural production, growth and expected production)
  • Data is collected and processed "in the field" for process optimization
  • Land rover with removable rechargeable batteries (12-48 Kw, depending on the needs)
  • Modular "plug&play" solutions: possibility to add and replace operating arms (eg: collection, spraying, chopping)
competitiveScenario:
• Agriculture: some international competitors operating mainly in the field of viticulture. FieldRobotics is a leader in Italy
  • Search & Rescue: market characterized by large manufacturers of vehicles/ aircraft for military purposes and strongly regulated by public procurement dynamics
description: The company designs and manufactures automatic/semi-automatic robotic systems (drones and land rovers) equipped with AI for carrying out work or monitoring in agriculture (including greenhouses), land, air, maritime and S&R (search&rescue). FieldRobotics also develops tools and implements to empower robotic systems, and offers a platform for data collection and processing to provide a comprehensive service. The systems developed are electric or hybrid, with docking station for battery charging, to reduce the impact of CO2 on the environment.
enablingTechnologies: AI, Autonomous Robots, LiDar
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications:
• Agriculture: support to agricultural activities, in particular for the collection of vegetables (tomatoes, kiwi and melons under test), cleaning of agricultural rows (vines, olive groves)
  • Search & Rescue: support in air search and reconnaissance activities by land and sea

owners.name: Alma Mater Studiorum Università di Bologna

payoff: Innovative Systems for the Next Generation Agricolture
revenueModel: B2C. Direct sales of drones and rovers, and related add-on modules for the services offered by the company.
targetCustomers: Small and medium farms, Civil Corps operating in the "S&R" sector

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: Trezerodue
abstract: Trezerodue supports companies to integrate ESG objectives into their business and competitive strategy.
businessTraction:
• Unicoop Firenze
  • Caffè Piansa
competitiveAdvantages:
• Leveraging ESG initiatives competitively
  • Scalable and replicable model
  • Creating value from ESG strategy
competitiveScenario:
Trezerodue's solution is characterised by:

  • Value creation through the application of ESG principles
  • Definition of the best ESG strategy based on competitors' approaches and stakeholders' expectations
  • Use of digital technologies in both the analysis and development phases of the proposed solutions
description: Trezerodue supports its clients in identifying potential markets and promoting their image through the preparation of marketing strategies in line with business objectives and consumer behaviour. Trezerodue is particularly active in supporting companies in integrating ESG objectives within their corporate and competitive strategy.
enablingTechnologies: SEO and SEM analysis software, text mining, and web scraping
mainApplications: Trezerodue is developing a model called ESGA, which aims to support companies in competitively exploiting ESG initiatives. The distinctive feature of the model is Authenticity, i.e. the ability to adopt an ESG approach in line with corporate strategy and customer expectations.
payoff: Providing management solutions
revenueModel: Consultancy services to companies and trade associations. The main characteristic of the ESGA model is replicability and scalability. In particular, by obtaining data through the consultancy service, the model is self-sustaining and guarantees an exponential growth path.
targetCustomers:
• SMEs interested in consolidating their market position
  • SMEs needing to extract value from ESG investments
  • Trade associations

trl.label: 2 - Formulation of a technological concept

title: Vsafe (Valorizing Sustainable Agri-Food and Environment)
abstract: Vsafe helps companies, supply chains and production systems in the identification and choice of operational strategies to enhance sustainability and its better management.
businessTraction: The model has been implemented and developed thanks to a LEADER project with the GAL Oglio-PO and subsequently remains operational and applied on three cases thanks to a project of the Kilometroverde Parma Consortium funded by Fondazione Cariparma.
competitiveAdvantages: The monetary quantification of the value of these services allows to make more informed and correct decisions, allows a better and correct design of urban green areas and to better communicate them to interested
competitiveScenario: Currently, the model developed by Vsafe does not find other competitors at the national level
description: Vsafe offers economic consulting services aimed at promoting competitiveness and sustainability in agro-food and innovative professional services in the areas of global sustainability, market intelligence and strategic consulting. It helps companies, supply chains and production systems to identify strategies and operational choices to enhance sustainability and its better management. Vsafe has developed a model for the quantification of the value generated by the public green in both urban and extra-urban areas
enablingTechnologies: Data analysis
mainApplications: Urban Green: quantifies both in biophysical and biochemical terms and in economic and monetary terms, the benefits of ecosystem services offered by urban greenery, so as to allow an overall assessment of all costs and benefits. Among the services considered are included: CO2 absorption, elimination of PM10, SO2 and NO2, reduction of water run-off, recreational services, aesthetic services that pour on adjacent buildings. Finally, a report is produced that quantifies costs and benefits, private and social, in order to provide a conclusive analytical assessment
payoff: Enhancing the sustainability of agri-food chains and the environment
revenueModel: Consulting services
targetCustomers: Public administrations and private construction companies, both civil and craft and industrial, designers/ planners/ architects

trl.label: 7 - Demonstration of the prototype in a real operational environment

title: Neuroconnect
abstract: Neuroconnect has the initial objective to investigate and quantify the electrophysiological "markers" of the physiological and pathological aging of the human brain (including neurodegeneration), through neurophysiological techniques and NIBS (Non-invasive Brain Stimulation).
businessTraction:
• BIONEN srl for hardware development
  • TIM spa for app development support
competitiveAdvantages:
The device stands out from its direct and indirect competitors thanks to several key features that make it unique in the field of sleep optimization:

  • Precision and customization of the EEG
  • Integrated app for personal monitoring
  • Personalized stimulation on the individual characteristics of the subject
  • Advanced analysis with specific algorithms
  • User experience
competitiveScenario: To date, the treatment of insomnia takes place through pharmacological substances that must be taken constantly, resulting in high costs and important side effects, dependence, drug resistance. Our solution is a non-pharmacological alternative for the treatment of insomnia, based on non-invasive personalized stimulation, scientifically validated, and without copies on the market
description: The device revolutionizes sleep monitoring and optimizes sleep. The helmet, lightweight, comfortable, easy to wear, offers a non-invasive solution to improve the quality of sleep through the use of only six integrated EEG channels that allow you to collect real-time data on the brain activities of the subject, offering a detailed overview of the state of sleep. Through EEG analysis algorithms, device and integrated app identify the signals that indicate falling asleep stimulating the transition to a deep and restorative sleep
enablingTechnologies: Advanced EEG analysis algorithms, integrated mobile application for user interface, cloud computing, IoT
fundingStageDescription: Non-repayable funding has been received from entities, without transferring company shares
mainApplications:
• Individual sleep improvement: Users can use the device to monitor their night habits and receive personalized stimulation to facilitate deep and restful sleep
  • Medical field: support in the management of clinically diagnosed sleep disorders, offering a non-pharmacological solution to patients
  • Fitness and sports performance: optimize night rest, improving muscle recovery and overall athletic performance
  • Travel and time zones: facilitate adaptation to local time, reducing the effects of jet lag

owners.name: Fondazione Policlinico Universitario Agostino Gemelli IRCCS

payoff: Transforms neuroscience into technologies applied to the study of healthy brain and neurological diseases
revenueModel: B2C
targetCustomers:
• Subjects with sleep disorders, light sleep
  • Athletes
  • Any user who wants to optimize rest
  • Frequent travelers and those who want to easily adapt to jet lag

abstract: Sis.Ter. Pomos designs and implements flexible and customized solutions for modeling and optimal management of complex processes, adopting proprietary solutions in the field of energy efficiency and sustainable mobility.

Pomos provides innovative and sustainable products and services for alternative energy, green economy and sustainable mobility through measures that increase the efficiency of energetic systems in synergy with modern ICT and AI technology: machine learningand big data analytics.

  • Evolutionary optimization algorithms
  • Data Mining and Big Data Analytics

  • Systems for predicting faults on distribution networks and minimizing power losses on distribution networks
  • Development of devices dedicated to monitoring electrochemical battery packs and algorithms for estimating the state of charge and state of health

title: ISA - Innovations for Sustainable Agriculture
abstract: ISA R&D helps the transition to sustainable agriculture by developing and supporting the implementation of innovative solutions in the food chain.
businessTraction: Private agreements with companies
competitiveAdvantages:

  • Improving the quality of agricultural products
description: ISA R&D works in the field of sustainability and biostimulants in agriculture. The core business is divided into two strands: (i) development of biostimulants based on microorganisms and natural compounds and promotion of their placing on the market; (ii) evaluation of the effects of products/practices tested on the functionality of the agro-ecosystem (C and nutrient cycles) and ecosystem services (e.g. C sequestration, GHG emissions). In addition, it develops approaches for sustainable and low-input agriculture and solutions for remediation and improvement of soil production status
enablingTechnologies: Biotecnologie microbiche, bioinformatica, metabolomica, metagenomica
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (BAs, incubators, accelerators). Funding range: € 50,001 - 250,000

Compared to "similar" products existing on the market, CTLup's products are based on the use of a vast set of data and on the use of integrated analysis methodologies of the same, offering simple application solutions.

Products:

title: ALTIS Advisory
abstract: ALTIS Advisory offers ESG consulting services to support economic actors in overseeing environmental, social, and effective governance structures and rules.
competitiveAdvantages:
Peculiarities of the A4ESG assessment model:

  1. Based on the application of consolidated methodologies in the field of ESG performance measurement
  2. Suitable to enhance the specificities of Italian SMEs as "capture" the corporate approach oriented to sustainability although not formalized and not demonstrable
  3. Promotes the enhancement of the social dimension of sustainability, often undersized in the valuation models on the market
  4. Identify a customized improvement plan for the company, also in relation to the expectations of the main business stakeholders
competitiveScenario:
• Consulting and auditing companies (KPMG, Deloitte, PWC, EY): no skills with high training in scientific approach
  • Small consulting (REFE, Collectibus): social or environmental specialization, but without strong scientific competence and method
  • Third mission initiatives with services related to the ESG theme (e.g. Bocconi University, MIP), but none with a portfolio of services such as ALTIS
description: ALTIS Advisory offers ESG consulting services to support economic actors in managing environmental (E), social (S), effective governance structures and rules (G) impacts. ALTIS uses and exploits the results of the research carried out to respond to the request for the management of paths oriented to the control of the ESG dimensions and the measurement of the impacts (output and outcome) generated. The main feature of the offer is A4ESG, a proprietary ESG assessment model that evaluates the sustainability profile of the company under assessment
enablingTechnologies: Data Analysis
mainApplications:
Application of A4ESG assessment in the following areas:

  1. Single company - mainly SMEs
  2. Sector level: calibration of the A4ESG model according to industry specifications and evaluation of a panel of companies in the sector linked to trade associations (CNCC, UCIMU, Assalzoo)
  3. Financial sector: use of the A4ESG model for the ESG due diligence of target counterparties of investment funds (ex-ante screening) and ongoing evaluation of companies acquired by investment funds, to verify the progress of improvement plans, starting from the evidence of the ESG assessment
payoff: Be the authoritative and innovative consulting boutique to support the positive impact of economic actors
revenueModel: Sales of ESG consultancy projects
targetCustomers:
• Enterprises: need to implement ESG reporting processes (e.g. companies subject to NFDR/CSRD)
  • Third sector: support in social reporting/impact/sustainability and/or assessing the impacts generated
  • Finance (banks, investors,...): integration of ESG assessments in investment processes, with the need for support in reporting activities and results generated

This better value for money allows you to offer a high quality service at an affordable cost, ensuring a competitive advantage in the catering industry and beyond

Olivia gives the restaurateur specific indications on how much to produce and what level of inventory to maintain. abstract: Deix creates artificial intelligence algorithms and applications that help companies in various sectors make the best decisions.
businessTraction: Collaborations with commercial partners: OTTOZEROUNO
competitiveAdvantages:
The design approach that the company proposes is to develop algorithmic solutions, in which diversified techniques and methodologies converge, strongly adapted to the needs of the individual company reality, for which the "general purpose" algorithmic tools available are often not very effective.

Skills of the highest technical and scientific level can make it possible to create complex systems that are optimized and based on different algorithmic solutions that are able to respond efficiently and effectively to the needs of individual business realities.

This allows not only to develop data-driven models but also to translate and formalize business know-how, enabling us to create models that are more explainable, interpretable, and ethical.
description:
Deix was born with the goal of overcoming the challenges of innovation through the complementarity of its competencies. We are leaders in providing deep learning, advanced optimization, sensor & data fusion, and machine learning solutions.

We collaborate with companies in the defense, manufacturing, machinery, and healthcare sectors, and we develop innovative solutions that best exploit the potential of mathematics and AI.

Thanks to a team with consolidated experience, we commit ourselves to the digital transformation of companies, offering tailor-made projects, workshops, and training.

Joint use:

  • Machine Learning

We offer consulting services, software development, and training, leveraging mathematics and AI to create custom solutions.

Among our leading products:

Companies in the fields:

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: eNextGen
abstract: eNextGen markets impact assessment services, including corporate carbon footprint estimation for ESG reporting, life cycle analysis of individual products, and the development of tailored software solutions for environmental and energy analyses.
businessTraction: Incubated at PoliHub, after accreditation as "Spin-off of the Politecnico di Milano"
competitiveAdvantages: Products on the market offer flexibility, reproducibility, and adaptability across different contexts and spatial-temporal scales, making them suitable for a wide range of clients. The products based on MARIO rely on a numerical tool which, when properly informed and updated with the most recent databases, can deliver a transparent and reproducible quantitative outcome. Additionally, the use of a quantitative tool—highly flexible and adaptable even to different scenarios—significantly reduces the number of person-hours required to fulfill each project.
competitiveScenario: Some competitors have stronger customer traction by leveraging powerful marketing. eNextGen puts scientific rigor, product quality, and full compliance with new regulations at the heart of its approach.
description: eNextGen’s impact assessment services encompass corporate carbon footprint estimation for ESG reporting, product life cycle analysis, and the development of software solutions for environmental and energy analyses. The SW, developed by the SESAM group at PoliMi, is built on versatile, open-source Python modules and can be customized via dedicated libraries. Currently in development are a B2C application to guide end consumers in energy-renovation assessments and a platform called BitCO2 for issuing, transferring, and tokenizing reduced CO₂.
enablingTechnologies: Blockchain, cloud, SQL, Python, Git
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received (family&friends, BAs, crowdfunding) with possible transfers of company shares. Funding range: € 5,000 - 50,000
mainApplications:
• MARIO (Multifunctional Analysis of Region through Input–Output): B2B solution on the market;
  • Corporate carbon footprint: estimated emissions scope 1, 2, 3 based on the GHG protocol for sustainability reports;
  • Product carbon footprint: Hybrid LCA analysis using recognized DB and customer data;
  • Training: company trainingon sustainability. Practical courses discovering MARIO and and its potential for performing analysis;
  • CBAManager: a market solution for companies, providing updates on the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) regulation and compiling the EU-required report.
payoff: Know, improve and communicate your sustainability
revenueModel:
Monetization of the solution will be achieved through two primary models:

  • Subscription-based SaaS: access via tiered subscriptions;
  • Market-maker model: the company operates a marketplace where tokens, awarded according to client activities that reduce environmental impact, are issued and traded.
targetCustomers:
Products on the market (B2B):

  • Small and medium-sized enterprises for corporate carbon footprint services;
  • Product carbon footprint solutions targeted at any type of company;
  • Possibility to develop custom software integration solutions.

Products under development (B2C):

  • Residential clients;
  • Collaboration with partners involved in the development of building energy retrofit solutions.

title: Ant-X
abstract: ANT-X designs and builds custom drone solutions for specific industrial applications. It also provides laboratory solutions for research and teaching in UAV flight control and flying robotics.
businessTraction: Partnership for commercialization of ARIES, in collaboration with DRB srl who commissioned the development of ARIES and developed the robotic arm integrated with drone, and a global leader company in production of tools for inspection of high voltage powerlines.
competitiveAdvantages:
• Easy, fast and accurate asset assessments
  • Increased operator safety, eliminating the need to bring workers into high-risk environments, reducing potential hazards
  • Reduction of costs and times: expenses tied to the rental of equipments (crane/scaffolding) are avoided
  • Idle or eliminated asset downtime (inspections during asset operation)
  • AI supports the pilot both during inspection (reduction of workload and identification of the inspection point and obstacles), and in post-processing of collected data (analysis and detection of anomalies)
competitiveScenario:
• ANT-X provides teaching materials, using open source SW tools, known in academia, to quickly switch from design to testing without code writing
  • 2 competitors specialized in thick drone contact inspections of metal structures and LPS of wind turbines. ARIES allows to integrate on board different types of payloads opening contact inspection scenarios in different areas
description: ANT-X designs and builds custom drone solutions for specific industrial applications, covering the entire design cycle, prototyping, integration, and in-flight testing of UAV platforms, both for research purposes (flight control, flying robotics, multi-agent systems and aerospace control) and for industrial applications. ANT-X designed ARIES, a drone platform for non-destructive inspection (NDT) in contact. With a non-conventional configuration, ARIES ensures stable and safe flights, exerting forces in all directions for contact and interaction with the environment
enablingTechnologies:
• Motion capture (precise high-frequency tracking)
  • Unconventional drone configuration with tilted rotors at fixed angles
  • Open Source Flight Control (PX4 firmware)
  • Proprietary SW for Control Module Generation
  • High Precision Localization (even without GNSS signal)
  • AI
mainApplications:
• Laboratory solutions: research and teaching in flying robotics and aerospace control of UAVs
    • Rapid implementation of design methods
    • Practical experiences for students
  • ARIES: drone platform for non-destructive inspections (NDT)
    • Easy, fast and accurate asset assessments
    • Reduces risk and operator costs
    • Non-conventional configuration for stable flights and operating forces in contact with the environment
    • Ability to perform NDT inspections reducing downtime and ensuring accurate and repeatable results, revolutionizing safety and efficiency
payoff: Drone solutions for education, research and industrial applications.
revenueModel:
Academy:

  • Sales of laboratory solutions
  • Subscription/Service for SW updates, maintenance and technical support

Companies (custom drone):

  • Drones for NDT inspections
  • Sale of ARIES drone platforms
  • Training programmes
  • Service contracts for maintenance/technical support for commercial users
targetCustomers: Universities and academic institutions, infrastructure sector (inspection of civil structures such as bridges, viaducts, buildings), energy industry (inspections of power lines, pipelines), manufacturing plants (inspections of industrial structures and buildings), renewable energy (especially wind turbines), Oil & Gas (oil and gas infrastructure, including pipelines and platforms)

title: Morfo Design (MORFO)
abstract: MORFO deals with advanced aerodynamic design, designing aerodynamic components with advanced design techniques.
competitiveAdvantages:
As far as CAE tools is concerned, MORFO is at the forefront, having both the most modern commercial SW for CFD (Computational Fluid Dynamics) analysis and geometry management, and the ability to develop in-house SW for the applications in which it is more versatile than what is available on the market.
The internal management of HW infrastructures allows us to reduce costs compared to competitors and to stand out for solutions with very high technological content. These points represent the distinctive and innovative element of MORFO's proposal compared to what is offered on the market today.
competitiveScenario: Market already developed, with important competitors. Compared to what is already on the market, MORFO offers the possibility to integrate and manage a parametric approach to design, based on AI techniques, the intensive use of CAE (Computer Aided Engineering) methods and HPC (High Performance Computing) computing power, in a unique suite of dedicated and customizable design
description: MORFO deals with advanced aerodynamic design, designing aerodynamic components with advanced techniques. MORFO combines science, technology and observation from nature to assist in the design of aerodynamic components of the future. The activity is characterized by the innovativeness of the adopted approaches and the proposed solutions. Services and products are based on the adoption of an integrated digital design environment capable of managing complex geometries, evaluating their aero-mechanical performance with numerical analysis tools, and optimizing the solution using AI techniques
enablingTechnologies: AI, System Integration, HPC Computing, Big Data Analytics, CFD
mainApplications: The application of aerodynamic innovations concerns disparate technological areas which, starting from aeronautical propulsion (engines) and the production of electrical energy (turbomachinery), reaches many other important industrial sectors in which to introduce new and powerful aerodynamic analysis and optimization approaches borrowed from aerospace research: renewable energies (wind and hydraulic turbines), aeraulic machinery, automotive, sports.
payoff: Advanced Aerodynamics
revenueModel: Four sources of revenue: R&D consultancy activities, consultancy activities for contract design, sale of software packages dedicated to design, sale of HPC resources
targetCustomers: Leading companies in the aeronautical, space, energy (fossil or renewable) sectors, Oil&Gas, Fan&Blowers, hydraulic machines, automotive

title: Wsense
abstract: WSense is a deep-tech company, specialized in underwater monitoring and communication systems, based on patented technologies that have pioneered the Internet of Underwater Things (IoUT).
businessTraction:
• ENEA, SAIPEM, Lazio Region, Ministry of DEFENSE, European Agency for SME
  • 2025: 7.2 million euros pre-Serie B round participated by CDP Venture Capital SGR, Blue Ocean of SWEN, RunwayFBU, Axon Partners Group, Fincantieri, Rypples
competitiveAdvantages:
Wsense offers complete solutions, building on the customer’s needs and WSENSE innovative monitoring and communication technologies to provide affordable value to assets customers have already invested in, adding functionality to current systems, increasing profitability and competitiveness.
It provides end to end components engineered to enable multi-modal secure wireless communications and networking among submerged and surface sensing and robotic platforms
description: WSense is a deep-tech company, specialized in underwater monitoring and communication systems, based on patented technologies that have pioneered the Internet of Underwater Things (IoUT).

mainApplications: Wsense breakthrough Internet of Underwater Things solutions guarantee a complete cableless networking interoperability among various vendors of underwater sensors and autonomous vehicles (UAV, ASV, AUV), ensuring real-time monitoring and an extensive surveillance of underwater environments, waterways and marine seabeds. WSENSE solutions support Blue Growth’s long term strategy in the marine and maritime sectors as a whole and sustain companies to be more “eco-innovative” with a marked reduction in cost and a significant increase in value, in terms of market share and brand reputation.

revenueModel: The objective of this development phase is to consolidate, also thanks to investments, such as scale up deep tech and to bring the developed innovations to a global scale, having received great interest from stakeholders who are market leaders in the target sectors.

title: Nhazca
abstract: NHAZCA (Natural HAZards Control and Assessment) offers solutions in the analysis and monitoring of natural hazards and large infrastructures for the management and mitigation of risks.
businessTraction: 452 customers
competitiveAdvantages: Use of innovative techniques such as Terrestrial SAR Interferometry (TInSAR) and Satellite (DInSAR & A-DInSAR), solutions that allow the measurement and control of surface movements of the ground and structures with millimetric accuracy. Development of PhotoMonitoringTM technology which allows you to monitor with extreme precision the changes and surface movements of structures and terrain through the use of images acquired from different platforms (terrestrial, aerial, satellite) and sensors (optical, multispectral, infrared, radar ).
description: NHAZCA offers cutting-edge solutions in the fields of geology, civil engineering and infrastructure projects, asset management and urban and territorial planning, global insurance market and cultural heritage for the protection of goods and people. This through innovative remote sensing and monitoring techniques from satellite, aerial and terrestrial platforms, also developed through constant collaboration with the world of academic research.
enablingTechnologies:
NHAZCA uses the following technologies to support the most complex engineering challenges:

  • SAR Interferometry
  • Long-range Laser Scanner
  • UAVs equipped with high tech cameras
  • Infrared thermography
  • PhotoMonitoring
  • Multispectral sensors
  • Global Navigation Satellite System
  • Gigapixel Photogrammetry
mainApplications: NHAZCA offers specialized consultancy and services aimed at the assessment and mitigation of natural risks (e.g. hydrogeological risk, volcanic risk, seismic risk, avalanches and glaciers), land use planning, design and construction of major engineering projects and strategic assets (e.g. viaducts, roads/motorways, tunnels, dams) and related to the safety of citizens and the collective architectural and cultural heritage.
payoff: High technology for the protection of land and infrastructure

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: Random Power (RaP!)
abstract: Random Power produces bits of random state from the analysis of processes attributable to the quantum nature of matter, inviolably random and unpredictable.
businessTraction:
First contracted customer (under NDA).

Our industrial collaborators, partners of the industrial development project supported by the European Commission through a grant of EUR 2 million (ATTRACT project), are: KUDELSKI security (Switzerland), SECO (Italy), E4-computer engineering (Italy), IMASENIC (Spain), WEEROC (France)
competitiveAdvantages:
Compared to other Quantum True Random Number Generator (Q-TRNG), Random Power offers these advantages:

  • Greater simplicity and robustness, resulting from the patented principle, based on silicon and non-exogenous endogenous generation (e.g. by photon detection)
  • Possibility to integrate the device in a chip in standard CMOS technology (currently in production)
  • Resulting ability to build chips with built-in cryptographic capabilities
competitiveScenario:
• ID-Quantique (CH, part of SK-Telecom (KOR)), produces photon chips with higher complexity
  • Quintessence labs (AU) uses an endogenous principle such as rap! but not CMOS compliant, cannot be integrated into chips
  • QUSIDE (ES) differs in the quantum principle behind the generation, not integrable in standard CMOS

Rap! has integrated the DRBG chip mechanism, unique for AES-256 encrypted bit streams
description: Random number streams are the basis of encryption and privacy protection processes or protocols. Today, random numbers are the result of algorithms, fast and simple in the implementation but limited by the result of deterministic procedures, not really random, and fragile because dependent on "seeds" of initialization that, if intercepted, allow the violation of the system. Random Power overcomes these limits by producing random state bit flows from the analysis of processes traceable to the quantum nature of matter, inviolably random and unpredictable.
enablingTechnologies: Chip with CMOS standard technology, encryption, privacy preservation
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received (family&friends, BAs, crowdfunding) with possible transfers of company shares. Funding range: € 5,000 - 50,000
mainApplications:
• Root-of-Trust of industrial IoT systems
  • Public data base privacy protection platforms (differential privacy)
  • Privacy preservation mechanisms for access to public databases (Oblivious Random Access Memory)
  • Numerical simulations of complex systems

owners.name: AGH University Of Science And Technology of Krakow

payoff: Random Power: the value of unpredicatbility
revenueModel:
• Sales of hardware modules
  • Sales of integrated IPs in third-party systems
  • Privacy preservation services
targetCustomers:
• Cryptographic systems integrators and developers
  • Developers of industrial iot systems
  • Data base managers in the cloud

title: RePET
abstract: RePET aims to develop, produce and market innovative solutions based on recycle of polyethylenterephtalate with enhanced technology.
businessTraction:

  • 2024: 'Lorenzo Cagnino' award for green innovation, at the Ecomondo fair

competitiveAdvantages: Currently, more than nine hundred million tons of PET-based plastic waste are dispersed across the planet. From the application of dCSdT it is possible to exploit the waste material: the proposed chemical process therefore allows plastic to plastic - P2P recycling to be achieved, allowing the material to be reintroduced into its supply chain an infinite number of times.
description: RePET aims to recycle polyethylene terephthalate (PET) with advanced technology, which consists in the recovery and re-enhancement of post-consumer PET thermoplastic polymer (food or non-food packaging, polyester textile fibers and synthetic PET garments), through innovative green chemical recycling procedures.
enablingTechnologies: Patented dCSdT technology
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received (family&friends, BAs, crowdfunding) with possible transfers of company shares. Funding range: € 5,000 - 50,000
mainApplications: The advanced technology is able to provide terephthalic acid (TA) and ethylene glycol (EG), monomeric constituents of PET, and to separate the other components combined with it (additives, dyes, plasticizers, etc.), leaving them intact. Specifically, the depolymerization of PET is obtained through a chemical methodology conducted at room temperature, at room pressure, without the use of metals (metal free), using non-toxic and economically convenient bio-based catalysts, without emissions of toxic gases and carbon dioxide.
payoff: Recycling of polyethylene terephthalate (PET) with an advanced technology
revenueModel: The implementation of the technology is divided into various progressive Realization Objectives (ORs): experimental research, optimization and operational development of transference and scaling. By achieving the ORs, the RePET company will build a pilot plant.
targetCustomers: Companies operating in the recycling and regeneration of PET-based plastic waste

title: RE-SPORT
abstract: RE-SPORT develops innovative recycling technologies for the recycle of sports equipment and everyday goods made of plastic or composite materials.
businessTraction: Contracts are currently underway already signed with some major players at national and European level (cfr. RE-SPORT website)
competitiveAdvantages: The proposed technologies allow to separate with high efficiency and recycle all the parts that make up the sports equipment (and not only) through selective dissolution processes. The use of solvents from renewable sources that can be completely reused in closed-cycle processes makes the implemented solutions extremely sustainable both economically and environmentally.The development of selective dissolution processes of materials plastics by means of natural solvents make the process an environmentally friendly solution
competitiveScenario: There are currently no technologies available for the recycling of complex multifasic materials such as helmets, therefore destined for landfill and/ or waste to energy, with environmental and economic impacts. Alternative is the grinding of the helmet and consequent separation by means of automatic NIR and triboelectric separation systems, with limited efficiency in the separation of materials
description: RE-SPORT develops technologies for the development of sports equipment and everyday products in plastic and composite materials, through a process of recycling of multi-material systems at the end of life of various types, and in particular solutions for selective separation using natural solvents. RE-SPORT is responsible for developing the necessary steps to lead to the recycling of objects at the end of life from the proof-of-concept to the design of the final plant, with an assessment of the environmental impact and economic factors of the process
enablingTechnologies: Sorting, Recycling
fundingStageDescription: Non-repayable funding has been received from entities, without transferring company shares
mainApplications: Recycling of sports products and equipment in multiphase materials that are not yet recycled, in particular helmets, skis, tennis rackets; Many sports equipment manufacturers are looking for recycling methods in order to reduce the environmental impact of both regulations and marketing. The technology can be considered transferable (by means of appropriate precautions) to various sectors where there are multi-phase materials such as that of manufacturers of composite materials for acoustic and thermal insulation, furnishing accessories or fashion

title: Clentech
abstract: Clentech (Clean Environmental Technology) offers innovative materials for protection and safeguard of environment in building sector and not only.
businessTraction:
• Designtech: indoor treatment (Cofactory-MIND, Milan)
  • StepTechPark: commercial partnership
  • Vammon, ICMA SartorialPaper, Florim, ServiceBiotech, The Breath-Anemotech: technological partnership (development of photocatalytic solutions such as: plastics-pallet packaging, paper-packaging of luxury goods, ceramics, bio-tiles from agro-industrial waste, textiles)

competitiveAdvantages:

  • Antiviral, anti-mould, anti-pollution, antibacterial and self-sealing capabilities
  • Purification through photocatalysis: oxidation of pollutants that is triggered by the reception of light, and that the innovation of Clentech makes more effective and performing (patented process extends the photocatalytic effect to the valence band of the light spectrum from 300 to 600 nm, with particular efficiency in the 450 nm peak corresponding to LED light)
  • Also applicable to indoor environments, using UV-free lighting systems (such as LEDs)
competitiveScenario: The solutions on the market (e.g. GMTG7, Nanotech, PureTi) use methods to sanitize or make self-cleaning/antimicrobial surfaces (e.g. hydrogen peroxide, titanium dioxide) that need to exploit light with UV component to activate the process. Clentech technology uses both sunlight and artificial light (in particular LED) to sanitize air, environments and surfaces
description: Clentech overcomes the limits of traditional photocatalysis for efficient application in indoor spaces to sanitize air, environments and surfaces through a modified titanium dioxide (TiO2) compound. The hybrid material is produced in porous form and allows the realization of various products. Those validated in laboratories are: paints, sprays, packaging papers, air filters, water filters. The photocatalytic compound has been validated for degradation characteristics of VOCs (volatile organic compounds), disinfectant, sanitizing and purifying qualities
enablingTechnologies: Innovative process that extends the photocatalytic effect to the valence band of the light spectrum from 300 to 600 nm (with particular efficiency at the 450 nm peak that corresponds to LED light)

B2B

Designed to overcome the limitations of traditional energy storage systems, they offer greater security, energy density and flexibility. Able to be modeled on custom surfaces, they are ideal for integration in a variety of applications, from automotive to aerospace, without compromising aesthetics or performance. the objective is to establish Novac like leader in the field of the advanced energy, accelerating the passage to clean and efficient sources of energy
enablingTechnologies: The benefits of State of Charge (SOC) at the end of the cycle indicate reduced battery stress and higher extractable energy, with simulations showing up to 10% increase in SOC for a parallel battery/supercapacitor configuration without electronic control
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (BAs, incubators, accelerators). Funding range: € 50,001 - 250,000

title: Trireme
abstract: Trireme - Technologies for Reliable Innovative REMEdiation - is operating in the sector of remediation of sites contaminated by toxic pollutants, specialized in environmental consultancy and development of innovative technologies for environmental remediation, offering solutions
competitiveAdvantages: The novelty of the reclamation method lies in the hydraulic manipulation of the aquifer, with recirculating wells and no net water extraction, to effectively mobilise contaminants trapped in areas of low permeability. Recirculation allows electron donors to be distributed directly in situ to stimulate dechlorinating biological activity. This is achieved through the continuous fermentation of a biodegradable polymer, PHB, poly-beta-hydroxybutyrate. An iron-zerovalent reactor completes the process by removing the mobilised contaminants.
description: Technologies for Reliable and Innovative REMEdiation proposes an innovative approach to the remediation of polluted sites and wastewater treatment, from the study and design to the implementation and monitoring. The startup provides highly innovative products and services with high technological content for the remediation of complex polluted sites and the purification of wastewater of different kinds.
enablingTechnologies: Chemical analyses, biomolecular analyses, site-specific biostimulation of microorganisms naturally present in contaminated sites, coupled chemical-physical-biological processes for complex contaminations, proprietary patented technologies.
mainApplications:
1. Monitoring of remediation interventions with multidisciplinary approaches:

  • Chemical analyzes for evaluating the progress of the remediation processes
  • Biomolecular analyzes for the evaluation of the effectiveness of biodegradation processes
  • Update of the Site's Conceptual Model

2. Design and Implementation: rehabilitation interventions from the treatability study to the pilot scale
3. Development: sustainable remediation processes and technologies using patented technologies
4. Consultancy: definition of advanced Conceptual Models to support remediation interventions
payoff: Environmental consultancy and development of innovative technologies for environmental restoration
targetCustomers:
• Companies that operate in the environmental remediation sector but do not offer integrated packages of services
  • Public entities

title: Turtle

competitiveScenario: Turtle’s offer differs from other consulting companies in that it approaches the issue of sustainability not as a passive cost that companies must suffer, but as a business to pursue. The proposed transition plan is therefore based on objective quantification and economic feasibility
description: Turtle helps companies to overcome the challenges of the transition to sustainability, with particular reference to the ecological and energy, providing them with a quantitative method of assessing sustainability and guiding them in the choice of plant efficiency and energy transition initiatives. The integration of different knowledge and specializations allows you to design, implement and measure improvement solutions for companies and institutions in order to optimize their environmental, economic and social impacts.

The applied recording signals techniques are at the frontiers of scientific knowledge and combined with expert scientific methods of the University High Resolution EEG Lab

title: MESPAC
abstract: MESPAC integrates satellite earth observation data and proprietary AI algorithms to develop methodologies for measuring meteomarine variables (wind and waves), essential for offshore activities (such as offshore wind and wave energy conversion).
businessTraction:
• January 2025: round Seed from EU 1.5 M. Investment led by Galaxia, the National Technology Transfer Pole of CDP Venture Capital, and by Axon Partners Group, together with COREangels Climate and Piemonte Next
  • ESA feasibility study
  • ESA-BIC incubation program
  • PNI 2022 Cloud prize (Babylon)
  • NETZ TechX Cohort 5
competitiveAdvantages:
• Spatial resolution: Advantageous over global retest models
  • Temporal resolution: comparable with spatial resolution of reanalysis models (1-3 hours)
  • Space coverage: global, advantageous compared to satellite surveys, whose coverage depends on the navigation orbit
  • Time coverage: the same as input data used by AI algorithms (for in-situ data instrumentation in the order of 1-2 years)
  • Timeliness of obtaining information: virtually instantaneous, as for resuscitation models and satellite data (in-situ instrumentation: up to 48 months)
competitiveScenario:
1. In-situ instrumentation: accurate, temporal resolution only for point of interest, time extension limited to installation
  2. Satellite readings: information for regions covered by orbit (swath), time resolution dependent on return time (revisit time)
  3. Weather models: low spatial resolution, inability to describe extreme events, need for direct calibration
description: MESPAC develops methodologies for measuring meteomarine variables (wind and waves), indispensable for offshore activities (such as offshore wind and wave energy conversion), based on the integration of terrestrial observation satellite data and AI algorithms to increase their spatial-temporal resolution. In this way, MESPAC is able to provide data at least 40% faster than the current state-of-the-art techniques and avoiding the criticalities of in-situ measurements, also implying significant economic savings and reduction of greenhouse gas emissions
enablingTechnologies: AI algorithms for satellite data gap filling (to increase the space-time resolution of information from raw data), HW and SW adequate to manage and manipulate heterogeneous data in DB structures, front-end to allow interaction with both raw data and processed data
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications:
• Selection of installation site for an offshore project
  • Monitoring of a large offshore area on which assets are installed
  • Planning installation, operation, and maintenance operations
  • Forecasting near real-time and near-term future weather conditions for routine and predictive maintenance activities
  • Participatory science applications to integrate data provided by individual users
  • Characterisation and monitoring of small- to medium-scale climate phenomena
payoff: MESPAC makes metocean survey intelligence from space
revenueModel:
Saas with 2 revenue streams:

  1. Metocean study: site selection and its meteomarin characterization in a short time and reduced costs, with sampling also prior to the start date of the service
  2. Metocean Monitoring: Near-real-time data supply for built and operational plants
targetCustomers:
1. Offshore renewable developers, who would benefit from MESPAC a reduction in time and cost. This segment accounts for 80-90% of the market’s spending capacity
  2. Public and private research centers: need to recover data with limited field operational capacity
  3. Local authorities, power plants and coastal communities: need to formulate monitoring policies and strategies

trl.label: 3 - Experimental proof of concept

title: MEGA Materials
abstract: MEGA Materials develops and manufactures rare-earth doped fluoride monocrystalls for both research and industry, enabling the design and manufacture of devices that would not be possible using alternative materials.
competitiveAdvantages:
Fluoride monocrystals have peculiar properties for the realization of active and passive optical devices due to their physical chemical properties:

  • Large wavelength transparency window
  • Chemically stable and non-hygroscopic
  • Easily doped with rare earth trivalent ions
  • Only class of compounds that supports certain applications such as visible lasers on praseodymium or optical cooling of solids
  • When used in the production of solid state lasers, they allow to obtain high power and high beam quality TEM00
competitiveScenario: The current direct competition is located outside Europe and is summarized in a manufacturer located in the U.S. ("AC Materials", Florida), able to provide, with a high quality degree, most of the materials we produce. There are also few other manufacturers, located in the People’s Republic of China, limited in the supply of one or two specific crystals
description: MEGA Materials develops and manufactures crystalline materials, mainly fluorides doped with lanthanides and rare earth ions, which are fundamental in many application fields such as photonics, telecommunications, medical, allowing you to design and build devices that otherwise would not be possible. MEGA Materials also provides technical consulting services for the design development of new devices, and testing of different kinds on materials, providing the customer with basic tools for selecting the product or verifying the quality of a product purchased elsewhere
enablingTechnologies: MEGA Materials has 3 crystal growth machines for the Czockralski technique, 2 for the Bridgman and micro-pulling-down techniques, allowing to offer a wide range of products in terms of materials, and equipment for the characterization of materials and spectroscopy
mainApplications:
MEGA monocrystalls can be used in many applications including:

  • Increasing the efficiency of photovoltaic cells
  • Development of innovative optical cryocoolers for space applications
  • Development of metrological laser sources that will allow the miniaturization of atomic clocks with interesting fallout in the satellite field
  • Development of compact laser sources in the 4 micron region for LIDAR and environmental monitoring applications
  • Development of 2 micron laser sources for carbon dioxide satellite monitoring
  • Applications of biomedical diagnostics
payoff: High-quality fluorides laser crystals
revenueModel: Direct sale of crystalline materials and R&D development of materials and equipment, on behalf of individuals or within projects
targetCustomers: In the first years of activity, MEGA Materials turned to public and private universities and research institutions, to which it turned both with products and with R&D collaborations. Currently the company is looking for industrial customers to integrate its products in finished devices

title: IntelligEarth
abstract: Our mission is to revolutionize how humanity nurtures its own well-being, safeguards our planet, and preserves our rich cultural and natural heritages. We aim to be a game-changer, redefining stewardship of the Earth and its legacies for present and future generations.
competitiveAdvantages: This collaborative effort not only enhances community involvement but also ensures detailed, frequent monitoring of diverse locations. IntelligEarth is looking to a future where technology and community engagement will guarantee sustainability and preservation of our world's cultural and natural heritage. This solution can create a world where heritage is cherished, nature is revered, and communities actively participate in preserving a legacy for future generations.
description: IntelligEarth aims to develop innovative technologies based on crowdsourcing systems and Citizen Science approaches for monitoring cultural and environmental heritage. Through the MONNALISA technology, researchers will be able to collect timely and detailed information for the management, conservation, enhancement and protection of cultural and artistic heritage. Thanks to the use of advanced image analysis algorithms and the strong domain knowledge of the proposing group, this technology will represent a unique and innovative solution in the current market.
enablingTechnologies: Technology, named MONNALISA (MONitoring Natural and culturAL assets by crowdsourcing Images Systematic Analyses), based on an application (iOS, Android) dedicated to data collection via mobile technology and a web-interface dedicated to data analysis.
mainApplications: The innovative solutions will transform everyday smartphones into dynamic tools for monitoring. The platform harnesses cutting-edge AI analytics to process this data, delivering actionable insights for proactive conservation management. This user-centric approach democratizes preservation, making it accessible and engaging, and heralds a new era of tech-driven, sustainable stewardship of our planet's invaluable treasures.
payoff: Innovative technologies based on crowdsourcing systems and Citizen Science approaches for monitoring cultural and environmental heritage
targetCustomers: Bodies responsible for managing and protecting the territory, Research Institutions, Managers of large infrastructures, cultural and environmental associations
