trl.label: 3 - Experimental proof of concept

title: bio IMeD
abstract: bio IMeD develops AI-based solutions to facilitate the diagnosis, treatment, and monitoring of serious diseases. Its goal is to anticipate the onset of illnesses by providing tools that enable primary screening and allow predictive analyses.
businessTraction:
• Università degli studi di Trieste
  • ASL n.3 di Nuoro
  • ASUGI (Azienda Sanitaria Universitaria Giuliano Isontina)
competitiveAdvantages: The innovation of the device lies in its high ability to automatically isolate and identify only the cells of interest, allowing for a drastic reduction (over 1/10) in current analysis times related to human recognition and the need for cell concentration. This will improve the throughput of tests, by providing quicker results and significantly increasing the number of daily analyses.
description: Device for the automatization of liquid biopsy, combining microfiltration, microfluidic chips, precision sensors, optical system with AI-based software. Reliable results, guarantee of cell recovery and reduction in analysis time and workload for the doctor, who will only need to validate the results. Also providing a remote monitoring system for individuals with heart failure to assess home behavior, improving the monitoring of clinical parameters and care aspects. The system operates in Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) mode, ensuring privacy and security.
enablingTechnologies: Cloud computing and artificial intelligence
fundingStageDescription: Non-repayable funding has been received from entities, without transferring company shares

trl.label: 4 - Technological validation in a laboratory environment

title: BIOMYCS
abstract: Biomycs designs and develops innovative solutions for the production of biomolecules for the cosmetic and/or nutraceutical industry (B2B).
competitiveAdvantages:
CIRCULAR BIOECONOMY: Recycling waste using "upcycle" production processes, utilizing industrial waste materials as input.

SUSTAINABILITY: Reducing environmental impact through eco-friendly biological production processes and engineered yeasts.

AVAILABILITY: Leveraging cutting-edge technologies that make otherwise scarce compounds available.

REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS: Ensuring compliance with the strictest regulations, anticipating regulatory requirements and market demands.

BIODIVERSITY: Selecting the best strain for specific processes through bioprospecting techniques.
competitiveScenario: The competitive landscape (cosmetic ingredient manufacturers) is characterized by high fragmentation, with good levels of profitability not always tied to company size (with the presence of several small to medium enterprises with high margins). Biomycs is focused on the high-end segment (customized high-value solutions) with targeted applications for cosmetics/nutraceuticals.
description: Biomycs utilizes advanced synthetic biology and bioengineering techniques to produce commercially valuable molecules. The processes are designed following the "Nature Positive" philosophy, minimizing environmental impact, valorizing resources and promoting the "One Health" philosophy, where technology contributes to human and planetary well-being. By combining genome editing technologies and microbial fermentation in biorefineries, Biomycs transforms non-edible organic residues into high-value products for the cosmetic and nutraceutical industries.
enablingTechnologies:
• Modular cloning: Assembly of DNA constructs through "Golden Gate Assembly."
  • Genome precision editing: Integration of constructs into microorganisms for the production of molecules.
  • Yeast cell factories: Genetically modified yeasts for the bioconversion of waste substrates into valuable products.
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications: The developed technology enables the sustainable production of many materials adopted in the products we use every day, to safeguard our planet. Biomycs produces ingredients sustainably and from renewable resources for various industries that have highly polluting and harmful production processes. The research and development team continues to promote more sustainable ingredients with a wide range of applications, paying particular attention to special ingredients for cosmetics and nutraceuticals, where the goal is to achieve the best possible impact.
payoff: Inspired by nature, provided by technology
revenueModel:
The company targets the B2B market.

Sale of ingredients (price x quantity).

Commissioned projects (cost +) vs. licensing vs. royalties.
targetCustomers: Cosmetic manufacturers: Offering products and services in the form of components and/or commissioned joint development projects (not selling B2C, with proprietary branded products).

title: Bluebiloba
abstract: Technological services for the enhancement and sustainable, shared management of forests, rural areas, and tree heritage.
businessTraction: "Otp for Eu - Smart Decisions for Sustainable Forest Management" is a European project that aims to develop, in collaboration with forest managers and other stakeholders in the forestry sector, a Decision Support System (DSS). This system provides them with ways to responsibly manage forests to optimize ecosystem services (FES), enhance forest resilience and improve their capacity to mitigate climate change at the European level.
competitiveAdvantages: Method and process innovations for sustainable management of environmental resources. Through Forest Sharing, the fragmentation of forest ownership is addressed, and management models are constructed to enable payment for ecosystem services. In urban environments, our sensors allow for dynamic and cost-effective monitoring.
competitiveScenario: No competitor uses our forms of property aggregation.
description: Bluebiloba specializes in processes and innovation for the agroforestry and environmental sectors. It develops innovative management methods for forests, wood production areas, and derivatives, as well as natural or protected areas. In urban environments, it focuses on innovations for tree stability assessment through the development of sensors, remote sensing and drone analysis. Decision support systems are developed using analysis models and specific data collections to enhance processes and methodologies in agricultural enterprises and other forms of active land management.
enablingTechnologies: Drones, ITC sensors, Algorithms, Remote sensing
fundingStageDescription: Non-repayable funding has been received from entities, without transferring company shares
mainApplications:
• Environmental and stability assessments of trees, both in forested areas and urban environments.
  • Utilization of sensors and remote sensing or drone analyses to support assessments.
  • Decision support systems through analysis models and specific data collections to enhance processes and methodologies in agricultural enterprises and other forms of active land management.
payoff: Guardare il patrimonio naturale con occhi nuovi, per una maggiore sostenibilità ambientale e un uso equilibrato delle risorse.
revenueModel:
B2C model.
A fee is retained for every euro earned by the client.
targetCustomers: Agricultural companies and private individuals owning forests.

title: VESevo Smart Technologies
abstract: VESevo is an innovative device, conceived with the aim of carrying out viscoelastic analyzes of the tread of tires, without, as usual, the need to remove samples to analyze them, thus making them unusable.
businessTraction: In 2020 has been recognized to be the best startup in Italy born from tech-transfer projects, for growth in turnover and staff. The very close link between VESevo and MegaRide represents a key partnership, both technological and commercial, which has already brought the innovative device into the main motorsport categories in the world.
competitiveAdvantages:
• Provides a non-destructive characterization of industrial products, composed totally or partially of polymers, for rapid and in-situ control of their viscoelastic characteristics.
  • The analysis makes possible to predict the behavior of the tire and of the entire vehicle, in variable operating conditions and progressive wear.
  • Finds potential use in various manufacturing sectors.
competitiveScenario: Current technologies for the characterization of polymeric materials used in the production of rubbers and plastics are linked to the conduct of tests using expensive and complex industrial equipment, based on the DMA technique. These consolidated methodologies imply the destruction of the sample of material to be analysed, with the consequent compromise of the artefact being characterized.
description: VESevo is an innovative device, conceived with the aim of carrying out viscoelastic analyzes of the tread of tires, without, as usual, the need to remove samples to analyze them, thus making them unusable.
enablingTechnologies:
• Analytics
  • App
  • Big Data
  • Data Integration
  • IOT
  • Stampa 3D
  • Software
  • Sensoristica avanzata
  • Data Visualization
mainApplications:
The product was created for tire characterization and quality control applications at tire makers and racing teams through an innovative and non-destructive methodology.

The main prospective market scenarios focus on quality control of plastic materials during production and continuous monitoring during their life cycle. The applications are extremely transversal and will include uses ranging from rubber seals to shoe soles, to sports products, to walkable surfaces.

owners.name: Università degli Studi di Napoli Federico II

payoff: Your Tire Bench, Wherever
revenueModel: La modalità di offerta di VESevo si basata sul noleggio del dispositivo. Ad essa sono affiancati servizi di manutenzione e taratura, in particolare per la versione Motorsport, supportata dalla possibilità di fornire consulenza specializzata.
targetCustomers:

  • Companies or SMEs that work and/or produce products in viscoelastic material.

title: Corticale
abstract: Cortical provides Neurotech industries and medical research companies with innovative components of high-definition neuro-interfacing to advance neuroprosthetics and therapies of human brain and mental disorders.
businessTraction:
Partner distributors that integrate or are about to integrate our technology:

  • Plexon
  • NeuroNexus
  • Tucker Davis Technologies
competitiveAdvantages:
• High integration
  • Number of sensors per device size
  • Architectural modularity
  • Low energy consumption
  • Very high time space resolution
  • Micrometric size for minimal invasiveness
description: Cortical develops, manufactures and markets high density active neuronal interfaces based on CMOS technology for clinical and pre-clinical applications. Technology is based on the SiNAPS architecture, to date it is the only one that implements the concept of "active pixel sensing" (APS) applied for implantable devices in vivo. A monolithic unit of micrometric size is able to record and amplify neuronal activity on site, but by replicating it it is possible to create neuronal interfaces capable of recording the biolettric activity of individual neurons from thousands of electrodes
enablingTechnologies: The SiNAPS architecture allows electrode densities of two orders of magnitude greater than any other neuronal interface on the market. The modularity of the technology allows rapid and flexible customization, for new solutions in clinical and research
mainApplications:
• In-vivo electrophysiology with high space-time resolution
  • Machine brain interfaces
payoff: Advancing brain solutions
revenueModel: B2B (OEM model)
targetCustomers: Distributors of medical equipment

title: BUP
abstract: BUP realizes a customizable solution of analysis and automatic classification of text, Genus, based on machine learning, language processing, and extraction of entities of interest, aimed at companies and public administrations.
businessTraction: Commerical agreements with Ellysse s.r.l and Reply Whiteall s.r.l
competitiveAdvantages:
• Automation of text analytics, managing large volumes of data, reducing time-consuming manual analysis dependence
  • Categorization and classification of documents by content, simplifying search, management and access to information
  • Extract specific information quickly and accurately, improving analytical productivity and accuracy
  • Customize categories based on domain or usage context
  • On-premises solution
  • Genus delivers business and PA benefits by automating processes, improving efficiency and enabling unstructured data analysis
competitiveScenario: Competitors offer general purpose solutions, based on training and corpus of texts written in English and translated into other languages. BUP instead offers customized solutions for companies/ public administration. Genus is flexible and adaptable, allows you to incorporate specific rules and ontologies for precise and relevant results, natively supporting the Italian language
description: Genus automatically identifies, given a generic text and predefined categories, the categories actually treated by the analyzed text. Genus is a SW that makes use of "NER - Named Entity Recognition", BUP’s pipeline of natural language understanding, useful for the rapid cataloging of text documents. Genus is used in the context of programmatic advertisement to categorize web pages, document logging in public context, in the customer care context to understand user requests and issues and provide appropriate and immediate responses.
enablingTechnologies: Artificial Intelligence (machine and deep learning), Natural language processing, Semantic technologies
mainApplications:

title: B.ETHICAL
abstract: Natural and ethical ingredients for the cosmetic, nutraceutical, and pharmaceutical sectors. B.Ethical possesses a portfolio of proprietary and customizable ingredients, meticulously characterized chemically and biologically, obtained from a transparent, ethical, and sustainable value chain.
businessTraction:
• Davines Srl (Parma), characterization and production of extracts for cosmetic lines
  • Eskin Srl (Bergamo), production of extracts for cosmetic lines
  • CorCon International (Parma) for exploratory studies on plant extracts as components of dietary supplements
  • TiLab Srl (Erba), formulation and production of extract blends for functional cosmetic products
competitiveAdvantages: B.Ethical playsit role in all the steps of the plant extracts production chain, rather than positioning itself as a transformer and producer. It identifies matrices based on expected biological properties, also drawing from the tradition, selects producers based on considerations of social, economic, and biological health, proceeds with complete characterization from a chemical-physical standpoint and identifies specific solvents and extraction methodologies tailored to the desired product.
competitiveScenario: The market for cosmetic & nutraceutical ingredients is globalized. High price and volumes competition drives improvement in quality and exclusivity. B.Ethical provides innovative & tailored solutions. In the cosmetics sector, introducing plant extracts without INCI designation in Italy and Europe and proceeding with registration, industrial property protection and safety/efficacy assessments.
description: B.Ethical provides plant extracts from raw materials sourced from ethically, socially and biologically sustainable supply chains, characterized by chemical and biological properties. The products meet the demand in the cosmetic and nutraceutical markets for ethically and organically certified sustainable products. B.Ethical offers solutions produced without the use of organic solvents, promoting raw materials from low soil consumption, reduced CO2 production and without antibiotics/pesticides. This allows for the exclusion of preservatives, colorants, and synthetic additives from the label.
enablingTechnologies: Green solution
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received (family&friends, BAs, crowdfunding) with possible transfers of company shares. Funding range: € 5,000 - 50,000
mainApplications:
• Cosmetic Sector
  • Nutraceutical Sector
  • Substances based medical devices Sector
  • Pharmaceutical Sector
payoff: Natural ingredients and ethical bioprospecting
revenueModel: B.Ethical aims to scale its activities while maintaining a B2B approach, thus avoiding the retail offering of finished products. This allows the company to focus its industrial efforts on the characterization of raw materials, bypassing the stages of packaging, distribution, and marketing.

  • Dietary supplements industry

title: ARISK
abstract: ARISK is an innovative deep tech start-up founded in 2017. With our proprietary algorithms we help companies, investors, financial institutions, administrations and public and private organizations to understand, quantify, monitor any type of risk.
businessTraction: Agreement with LINKS for the development of the new platform that collects all the services of ARISK.

  • Predictivity: algorithms to anticipate default risk and make informed decisions

  • Subscription flexibility: annual or monthly services, with the flexibility to adapt business needs
competitiveScenario: Deeptechnology for risk management and risk engineering is very little widespread in the world. Very few projects in place, and only in the eastern part of the Planet. In Italy there are not competitors, but a lot of confusion in the definition of the services provided by ARISK that is assimilated to credit rating agencies.
description: ARISK S.P.A. develops predictive algorithms such as solutions for risk engineering and risk assessment. Innovative solutions use deep technology and the help of artificial intelligence, conceived as a tool to support decisions according to the "data-driven" logic. The objective is to provide a tool that can help companies, investors, financial institutions, governments and public/private organizations to understand, quantify, monitor and manage risks: financial, governance, seismic, hydrogeological, infrastructure and cyber security
enablingTechnologies: Big Data Analytics, IA, Digital Twin, Platform/App, IoT
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications:
• Business risk management for SMEs that do not have risk management functions internally, giving them the ability to identify, measure and monitor financial, governance, cyber and infrastructure risks
  • Use of indicators by Agencies (Municipalities, Provinces and Regions). ARISK indicators are used with territory monitoring function (of relevance is the Ferrandina Hub Innovation project)
  • Use cyber indicators in healthcare to protect data privacy and monitor the vulnerability of healthcare facilities.
payoff: AI for Risk Management & Risk Engineering
revenueModel:
• Competitive selling of detailed reports containing indicator assessments, allowing companies to get a clear picture of their risks
  • Annual or monthly platform subscription services with access to continuous monitoring to manage long-term risks
targetCustomers: SMEs who want a comprehensive risk management solution but do not have the capacity to develop it internally. These SMEs can come from various sectors, including manufacturing, services, technology, and more. The ARISK solution is designed to be affordable and beneficial for companies of different sizes and industries.

businessTraction: Between 2022 and 2023, we installed several vertical cultivation systems in the off-soil of more than 20 schools in Northern and Southern Italy
competitiveAdvantages: Thanks to our channel you tube with more than 10'000 subscribers combined with our versatility of products and services offered we succeed and retain the customer very well and become a figure of refemineto in this area. We are able to provide customer-specific advice. Thanks to our knowledge in hydroponics, cultivation in containers of mushrooms and babyleaf, realization of bio-biologists we are able to work in different areas related to the urban farm, a topic that is taking more foot in the world context.
competitiveScenario:
Versatile offer and divulgative vocation distinguish us from competitors, that is commercial companies aquaponics, such as:

  • Idroponica.it: mass production kits, no customization
  • TheCircle: sells sought-after products at high prices to classy restaurants
  • Aquaculture Italy: line of aquaculture products/ systems at high cost and not customized in collaboration with Irciponic
description: Training, design and construction of cultivation plants in off-soil, from aquaponics to hydroponics. We want to shape the cities of the future with the promotion of off-soil cultivation, favoring the birth of hyperlocal productions and conscious and resilient communities. We believe that aquaponics is not just a product, but a tool to create networks of interdisciplinary and virtuous relationships. We listen, imagine and design customized aquaponics systems together with people. In Italy we spread and form communities for the diffusion of aquaponic culture.
enablingTechnologies: 3D printer, fusion modeling program
mainApplications:
• SW available online to understand which plant to build depending on the production you want to obtain
  • sale of projects for self-realization. Service ecommerce/ consulting to have construction manuals but to buy freely material
  • consulting and sales of materials for farms, with support during the construction and start-up of the plant
  • Structured YouTube channel with weekly dissemination content, video training and DIY
  • video courses/ebooks specific for urban farming
  • training courses on aquaponics, hydroponics, container mushroom cultivation, bio-needles

owners.name: Alma Mater Studiorum Università di Bologna

payoff: We design, we build cultivation plants above ground
revenueModel:
• Sale material via internet, where via YouTube channel we attract new potential customers (from the farmer to the private) interested in creating a garden outside the ground
  • work carried out on behalf of schools, and through Ecogreen
  • collaborations with companies, universities and research studies
targetCustomers:
• Farmers who want to modernize their farm, optimizing space
  • Schools, for educational use of our kits
  • Individuals interested in Minibraga DWT 2.0 for vertical cultivation that optimizes space
  • Catering and offices interested in creating green walls for productive, ornamental and phytodepuration purposes, thanks to the integration of specific lights

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: AOP4Water
abstract: AOP4Water offers innovative solutions based on environmentally and economically sustainable technologies for water and wastewater treatment.
businessTraction: At the moment AOP4Water has among its customers two companies that have commissioned an experimentation: 1. aimed at upgrading a platform for the treatment of liquid waste and subsequent recovery of by-products; 2. on Fenton and Photo-Fenton processes mediated by the catalyst patented by AOP4WATER s.r. as a pre-treatment to the biological process of industrial wastewater.
competitiveAdvantages: Unlike conventional photo-Fenton process which works at acidic pH (< 3) and requires acidification of urban wastewater (pH 7-8) and subsequent neutralization producing sludge, the photo-Fenton process developed by AOP4Water, thanks to the use of the patented catalyst, it can operate effectively even at neutral pH, with advantages in terms of economic and environmental sustainability.
competitiveScenario: Today the technologies to treat urban waste water are: adsorption on active carbon, not effective for disinfection; ozone to remove micropollutants; disinfection with Cl or UV lamps to inactivate microorganisms without removing micro-pollutants. AOP4Water simultaneously removes micro-pollutants and disinfects wastewater, without the disadvantages of O3 and Cl forming toxic by-products.
description: AOP4Water has developed an advanced photo activated oxidation process (both with solar radiation and UV) based on the reaction of (photo)Fenton, which exploits a catalyst in the form of an iron-organic complex.
enablingTechnologies: Catalysts, photo-Fenton
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (BAs, incubators, accelerators). Funding range: € 50,001 - 250,000
mainApplications:
• Simultaneous tertiary (disinfection) and quaternary (removal of contaminants of emerging concern) treatment of urban wastewater to be disposed into the environment or reused;
  • Application in small wastewater treatment plants, where the process is particularly effective when activated by solar radiation.
payoff: "Your challenges are our daily bread"
revenueModel: B2C, consulting services and customized services to adapt existing treatment plants.
targetCustomers:
• Operators of urban waste water treatment plants (photo-Fenton process)
  • public/private companies operating within the water cycle services and operating water and waste water treatment plants, or requiring a water or waste water treatment plant
  • Engineering studies/ freelancers for specialist project consulting

trl.label: 6 - Demonstration of technology in an industrial environment

title: Al.L.T.A.I.R.
abstract: The company is active in the field of preventive archaeology and archaeology of landscapes, applied sciences to archaeology and cultural heritage, enhancement and enjoyment of cultural heritage.
businessTraction:
• Collaboration with the University of Bari in investigations at the archaeological site of Egnazia
  • Interventions of preventive archaeology (doubling of the railway line Andria-Corato and the line Corato-Ruvo di Puglia)
  • Water supply and distribution works for irrigation purposes (Schema Idrico Basento-Bradano, Maruggio and Torricella), and preventive excavation works (Canosa di Puglia, Trani and Ceglie del Campo)
  • Collaboration with Ministries of the Ministry of Education and Culture
competitiveAdvantages: Al.T.A.I.R. s.r.l. deals with the management and application of the latest methods of archaeological research and the most advanced communication techniques for the study, the protection, enhancement and enjoyment of cultural heritage and is accredited to the Ministry for Cultural Heritage and Activities (case number 1259 of 19.10.2010) in the list of subjects entitled to carry out activities of documentation and prior assessment of archaeological interest.
competitiveScenario: Al.T.A.I.R. s.r.l. stands out from the existing corporate framework, ensuring through the use of high technology in the field of archaeology and communication, the technological leap necessary for a new entrepreneurial entity that faces the Cultural Heritage market.
description: Al.T.A.I.R. s.r.l. is aimed at the management and application of the most up-to-date methods of archaeological research and the most experienced communication techniques aimed at the enhancement and enjoyment of cultural heritage. The company is characterized by an interdisciplinary approach and offers integrated services in the field of study-enhancement-communication of Cultural Heritage with attention to forms of sustainable development through surveys of preventive archaeology and assessment of 'archaeological risk', using equipment and programs of the latest generation.
enablingTechnologies: Advanced topographic instruments, optical and digital systems for image acquisition and analysis (HW and SW)
mainApplications:
• Global approach to cultural heritage issues
  • Graphics and web-design, in particular musealization, enhancement, fruition and multimedia communication

owners.name: Università degli Studi di Bari Aldo Moro

payoff: HIGH TECHNOLOGY IN ARCHAEOLOGY FOR INNOVATION AND RESEARCH
revenueModel: B2B
targetCustomers: Private Companies and Public Administrations

trl.label: 4 - Technological validation in a laboratory environment

title: Alkivio
abstract: Creation of biocomposti plastic substitutes, highly sustainable as biodegradable, compostable, and compatible with the main industrial processes.
businessTraction: Clients both in the "Advisory/Prototyping/Technology Consulting" Business Unit and in the "Biocomposite Production and Sales" Business Unit.
competitiveAdvantages: Alkivio biocomposites offer a valid alternative to traditional plastics ensuring similar technical and aesthetic performance. The technologies used and our production processes are environmentally friendly, as we believe in the industrial symbiosis to achieve sustainable production through the implementation of solutions that minimize internal costs and maximize the benefit of our customers.
competitiveScenario: Alkivio’s competitors are traditional plastics manufacturers and all those small/medium/large Italian and foreign companies that aim to offer material-solutions that can replace traditional plastics.
description: Alkivio was born from the Joint Lab of the Italian Institute of Technology and Novacart, an Italian company world leader in the production of paper baking forms for the food sector. AlkiPaper has been developed based on the needs of sustainability: biocomposites designed to be biodegradable, compostable, eco-sustainable, colourable and compatible with the main industrial processes, such as injection printing, extrusion, thermoforming, 3D printing and blowing. Alkivio transforms the paper into AlkiPaper, a material that can be used like plastic and can decompose in a programmed way.
enablingTechnologies: Alkivio transforms paper into AlkiPaper, a material with the characteristics of plastic, both in production and in use, able to decompose in a programmed way.
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications: Alkivio aims to replace traditional plastics in multiple industries. All products that today are made with traditional plastics and for which related manufacturers are looking for solutions/ green versions can contact Alkivio.
payoff: Alkivio, Green Biocomposites
revenueModel: Production and direct sale of biocomposts and prototyping activities and technological consultancy activities.
targetCustomers: All companies that today use traditional plastics and are looking for green solutions for their products.

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: AgriZapp
abstract: Platform for the intelligent and sustainable management of resources, environment and livestock, allowing a rational use of goods.
businessTraction: • Lunagerber SRL: commercial partnership agreement
competitiveAdvantages:
• Integration of available technologies in a unique and exclusive platform ("VISTOCK"), for data interpretation, configuring itself as an important decision support tool (DSS)
  • Management system about animal movement and their health status, and the conditions of the pasture, including biomass production maps, so as to be able to size the grazing areas avoiding over/under-grazing phenomena
  • Control of the feeding necessary to the cattle during the seasons, implementing the sustainability of the company in economic and environmental terms
competitiveScenario: Current Precision Livestock Farming tools considered, such as GPS collars or Virtual Fencing, are used individually to locate and track grazing animals, and to apply virtual boundaries. There is currently no commercially available tool capable of providing, in a single solution, up-to-date data on grazing productivity from different technologies.
description: Integrated platform that combines advanced technologies, able to provide the breeder with simple, clear and effective information to better manage the company, exploiting its resources without exhausting them, reducing time and costs, protecting the environment. The solution solves common daily problems of farmers: time problems, both for the management of pasture resources and the management and control of livestock; efficiency of the performance of the pasture-livestock system; costs for the purchase of feed and fodder from outside, due to non-rational uses of resources.
enablingTechnologies: Platform/App, GPS, IoT, bluetooth, blockchain, system integration
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications:
• Increase the economic sustainability of traditional semi-extensive and extensive livestock production systems
  • Improving the productivity and quality of pasture resources will limit the need to purchase raw materials for animal feed from off-farm sources
  • The use of our solution will also lead to a reduction in farmers' working hours, resulting in reduced costs and improved quality of life for people
payoff: Let us help you manage how you pasture. Wherever you are.
revenueModel: SaaS, project consulting
targetCustomers: Livestock farms and public bodies that intend to exploit the pasture resource from the point of view of nutrition, animal welfare, and environmental protection. Initially for farms of 3-5 people, which raise cattle/sheep/goats in extensive and semi extensive systems, grazing area of min.30 hectares with wooded marginal land, difficult to use and fence off.

trl.label: 3 - Experimental proof of concept

title: AdapTronics
abstract: AdapTronics makes logistics sustainable on Earth and in Space, reinventing the robotic grip of objects of any shape, size and material. Thin film technology that becomes adhesive when electrically activated, with high strength density and minimal power consumption
businessTraction:
• 3 PoC in the industrial field (cartoning machines, packaging machines, palletizers, etc.) and interest from 3 other companies
  • Interest for a few from 2 companies for fruit harvesting, sorting and leaf separation
  • 3 ER region calls written with partners to finance R&D
  • NDAs signed by 4 space companies
  • SAIMA lab: technical collaboration for R&D
  • BIREX competence center industry 4.0: pilot line collaboration for demonstrators
  • ESA BIC: ESA incubator for business and technical space support
competitiveAdvantages:
• Electroadhesive-based solution: lightweight, compact and with minimal energy consumption;
  • It conforms to any object, grabbing it without damaging it and, also thanks to sensory feedback, allows great versatility;
  • In Space (microgravity and vacuum) the only solution available to date for docking is with mechanical joints that need preparation on the object to be grasped with mechanisms little versatile, not usable on space debris, and with heat to dissipate for high energy consumption.
competitiveScenario:
• Competitor: Grabit (USA) uses electroadhesion for industrial machines. Omnigrasp (EU) controls the grip of small, fragile objects
  • Space (LockheedMartin, AltiusSpace,...): little versatile gripping mechanisms, or electroadhesion combined with joints on the target
  • Traditional (On-Robot, Shunk,...): pneumatic-based suction cups that tighten objects, use compressors and power-usage systems, no versatile
description: AdapTronics has invented a thin film technology that lifts up to 50kg with 2 small patches, with grip force that can be scaled by increasing the surface. The system is lightweight (no magnets or compressors), versatile, with minimal energy consumption, and with integrated sensor capabilities. We address the need for automated and efficient robotic systems for gripping and manipulating objects in a wide range of markets, such as industrial automation, last-mile delivery with autonomous robots, automated fruit harvesting, Space debris removal and services in orbit.
enablingTechnologies: Electroadhesion, electronics printing, additive manufacturing, capacitive sensors, robotics, mechanical design
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (VCs). Funding range: € 250,001 - 500,000
mainApplications:
Automated and efficient robotic systems for gripping and manipulating objects in a wide range of markets, such as industrial automation, last-mile delivery with autonomous robots, automated fruit harvesting, space debris removal and satellite orbit services. The first few projects with companies are focusing on:

  • cartoning, packaging and palletising machines;
  • fruit harvesting, sorting and leaf separation;
  • automation of product handling processes in industrial lines;
  • handling spatial assets.

owners.name: Alma Mater Studiorum Università di Bologna

payoff: Grab anything. On Earth and in Space.
revenueModel:
1)EAAL, Electro Active Adhesive Layer: plug & play film, enables electroadhesion and sensor grip. Can cover grippers, robotic arms or interface surfaces. Scalable, sold by cm2

2)EAAG: EAAL embedded in a complete gripping solution for industrial + space applications
targetCustomers: Manufacturers of machines/robots/system integrators

trl.label: 5 - Technological validation in an industrial environment

title: ADDAX Biosciences
abstract: ADDAX Biosciences was born in 2017 as a result of a long research on pathological tissue fixation. ADDAX aims to eliminate Formalin - a carcinogen - from hospitals, research centers and laboratories, and replace it with a non-toxic fixative.
businessTraction:
• A.O.U. Città della Salute e della Scienza of Turin: project "Glyoxal in Endoscopy"
  • Zooprophylactic Institute of Turin: use of GAF in the veterinary field, for neurological diseases
  • Università degli Studi di Padova: use of GAF as a fixative in veterinary medicine
  • Istituto di Candiolo – IRCCS: Immuno K-ELISA project
  • Faculty of Dentistry of the University of Turin: development of innovative compounds that can replace the use of Formaldehyde in the dental sector
competitiveAdvantages:
• Accurate diagnosis without exposing healthcare staff to the risk of developing occupational diseases
  • Patented, CE marked and FDA approved product, proven effective in independent, national and international validation trials
  • Social impact: GAF® protects the health of healthcare workers. In addition, it reduces the environmental impact of carcinogenic Formalin vapors partially released into the air from laboratory fume cupboards, without compromising the diagnostic accuracy guaranteed through the optimal fixation of biopsy tissues
competitiveScenario: In recent decades no product has been able to offer acceptable diagnostic performance. There are other fixatives on the market which are an alternative to Formalin, but with unsatisfactory fixative efficacy. Currently, apart from GAF, there is not a valid alternative to Formalin. GAF therefore remains the only viable alternative to the use of Formalin for diagnostic use.
description: Formalin (based on formaldehyde, a carcinogenic, mutagenic and neurotoxic substance banned in the EU) is used in hospitals as a histological fixative. Addax has developed and patented Glyoxal Acid Free (GAF®), which offers fixation efficiency comparable to or greater than Formalin, but not carcinogenic. GAF® ensures accurate diagnosis without exposing healthcare personnel to the risk of developing occupational diseases. GAF® is a patented, CE marked and FDA approved product, has proven in independent, national and international validation trials, diagnostic effectiveness.
enablingTechnologies: Alternative histological fixatives
fundingStageDescription: Funding is being sought or has been received with transfers of company shares (BAs, incubators, accelerators). Funding range: € 50,001 - 250,000
mainApplications:
• GAF® is an alternative product to Formalin, to be used in histopathology for the fixation of biopsies for diagnostic purposes
  • New areas of application: a study demonstrating the effectiveness of GAF as an adoptable fixative in the veterinary field has recently been completed and further research is underway to broaden the scope of application
payoff: TOWARDS A FORMALIN FREE HOSPITAL
revenueModel:
• Outsourcing agreements for GAF® production and distribution, allowing scalability in other geographical areas and replicability of the business model, also for new formulations in development by the ADDAX R&D team
  • Workshop/webinar to present our secure solution to the most exposed categories
targetCustomers: Health and Diagnostics Sectors. In particular: a primary market consisting of hospitals and research centres (public and private), and a secondary market consisting of forensic laboratories, veterinary clinics and laboratories, emergency medical services and, in general, all diagnostic laboratories. A further reference market, in addition to the diagnostic field, is that of research.

trl.label: 9 - Complete system demonstration in a real operational environment (functional test with enabling technologies and application to the specific industrial sector)

title: Aeffective
abstract: Through the Quon proprietary platform, we develop advanced sentiment analysis software that helps analyze expressed opinions, make decisions and measure their results.
businessTraction:
• Modus srl and Rubisco srls: commercial agreements for the sale of our solutions in the GDO and Ho.RE.Ca and e-commerce respectively.
  • Sinaptic srl (our early adopter): commercial partnership for the application of our solutions to brand reputation.
competitiveAdvantages:
• Wide scope for customization of solutions
  • consulting and training
  • dedicated assistance
  • high quality/price ratio
  • intuitive and "actionable" KPIs
description: Advanced sentiment analysis software that helps analyze opinions expressed in documents, make decisions and measure their results. Our solutions are based on Quon, a proprietary analysis platform that uniquely integrates AI with a new philosophical theory of affection. Through Quon we automatically analyze documents, discovering if they express opinions and identifying the object and their value. We understand if the opinions expressed are positive or negative, and even if they manifest emotions and are opinions indicative of valuable attitudes such as loyalty.
enablingTechnologies: Artificial Intelligence, algorithms
fundingStageDescription: Non-repayable funding has been received from entities, without transferring company shares
mainApplications:
Current applications:

  • tourist destinations
  • ho.re.ca
  • customer care
  • retail
  • e-commerce

Future applications:

  • publishing
  • political marketing
payoff: We transform opinions into value
revenueModel: Licensing of customized solutions, with strategy of co-creation of the SW based on specific customer needs. In the short term, we plan to combine more standardized custom solutions, marketed as SAAS, for greater model scalability.
targetCustomers: Ho.re.ca, retail and e-commerce, publishing, and political marketing sectors
